manzils.text: Zanmei an la, chaojue wanwu, ta zai yiye zhi jian, shi ta de puren, cong jin si xing dao yuan si, wo zai yuan si de sizhou jiang fu, yibian wo zhaoshi ta wo de yibufen jixiang, an la que shi quan cong de, que shi quan ming de
Wo ba jingdian shangci mu sa, bingyong zuo yiselie de zisun de xiangdao. Wo shuo:“Nimen buyao she wo er caiqu renhe baohu zhe!”
Wo ceng shi qi yu nu ha tongzhougongji zhe de zisun a! Ta yuan shi yige gan'en de puren
Wo ceng zai jingdian li qishi dui yiselie de houyi de panjue shuo:“Nimen biding yao zai da dishang liang ci zuoluan, nimen biding hen aoman.”
Dang di yici zuoluan de yue qi lailin de shihou, wo paiqian wo de xuduo qiangda de puren qu chengzhi nimen, tamen jiu sousuole zhuzhai, na shi yao luxing de nuoyan
Ranhou, wo wei nimen huifule dui tamen de youshi, wo yi caifu he zisun zizhu nimen, wo shi nimen gengjia fushu

Wo shuo:“Ruguo nimen xingshan, name, nimen shi wei ziji er xingshan; ruguo nimen zuo'e, nimen shi wei ziji er zuo'e.” Dang di er ci zuoluan de yue qi lailin de shihou,(wo you paiqian tamen), yibian tamen shi nimen bian cheng wei choumeikulian de, yibian tamen xiang tou yi ci nayang zai ru jin si, yibian tamen ba ziji suo zhanling di difang jiayi cuihui
(Ruguo nimen huigai), nimen de zhu huoxu hui lianmin nimen. Ruguo nimen chongxin weikang wo, wo jiang chongxin chengzhi nimen. Wo yi huo yu wei bu xindao zhe de jianyu
Zhe bu “gulanjing” bi yindao ren yu zhi zhengzhi lu, bing yugao xingshan de xinshimen, tamen jiangyao xiangshou zuida de baochou
(Hai yugao) bu xin houshi zhe, wo yi wei tamen yubeile tongku de xingfa
Ren qidao huo fu, xiang qidao xingfu yiyang, ren shi jizao de

Wo yi zhouye wei liang zhong jixiang, wo mo diao heiye de jixiang, bing yi baizhou wei mingliang de, yibian nimen xunqiu cong nimen de zhu fachu de enhui, yibian nimen zhidao lifa he suanshu. Wo mingbai di jieshi yi qie jixiang
Wo shi mei geren de xingwei fuzhuo zai ta de bozi shang. Zai fuhuo ri, wo yao wei mei geren quchu yige zhankai de benzi
(shuo):“Ni du ni de benzi ba! Jintian, ni yi zu wei ziji de qingsuan ren.”
Shei zunxun zhengdao, shei zi shou qi yi; shei wu ru mitu, shei zi shou qi hai. Yige fu zui zhe, bu fu taren de zui. Paiqian shizhe zhiqian, wo bu chengfa (renhe ren)
Dang wo yao huimie yige shi zhen de shihou, wo mingling qizhongguo anle shenghuo zhe fucong wo, dan tamen fangdang bu jian, suoyi ying shou xingfa de panjue. Yushi wo huimie tamen
Zai nu ha zhihou, wo hui mie liao ruogan shidai. Ni de zhu duiyu qi puren de zuixing, zu wei che zhi zhe he mingcha zhe

Fan yu huode xianshi shenghuo zhe, wo jiang zai xianshi yi wo suo yiyu de baoda tamen zhong wo suo yiyu zhe. Ranhou, wo jiang yi huo yu chengzhi tamen, tamen jiang shou zebei, zao qi juedi jinru huo yu
Fan yu huode houshi, bing wei ci er jin nuli de xindao zhe, zhe deng ren de nuli shi you baochou de
Zhe deng ren he na deng ren, wo du yao yi ni de zhu de shangci zizhu tamen, ni de zhu de shangci, bushi shou zu'ai de
Ni kan wo zenyang shi tamen zhong de yibufen ren chaoyue ling yibufen ren; houshi que shi pinji geng gao, youyue geng shen de
Ni buyao shi renhe wu yu an la tong shou chongbai, yimian ni bian cheng shou zebei, zao yiqi de

Ni de zhu ceng xialing shuo: Nimen yingdang zhi chongbai ta, yingdang xiaojing fumu. Ruguo ta lia zhong de yiren huozhe liang ren zai ni de tangshang dadao laomai, name, ni buyao dui ta lia shuo:“Pei!” Buyao hechi ta lia, ni yingdang dui ta lia shuo you limao dehua
Ni yingdang bigongbijing de fushi ta lia, ni yingdang shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni lianmin ta lia, jiu xiang wo younian shi ta lia yangyu wo nayang.”
Nimen de zhu shi zui zhidao nimen de xinqing de. Ruguo nimen shi shanliang de, name, ta duiyu changchang huiguo zhe que shi zhi she de
Ni yingdang ba qinqi, pinmin, luke suo ying de de zhouji fen gei tamen, ni buyao huihuo
huihuo zhe que shi emo de pengyou, emo yuan shi gufu zhu en de
Ruguo ni bixu qiu de ni suo xiwang de cong zhu jiang shi de enhui hou caineng zhouji tamen, name, ni yinggai dui tamen shuo wenhe dehua
Ni buyao ba ziji de shou shu zai bozi shang, ye buyao bashou wanquan shen kai, yimian ni bian cheng huihen de shou zebei zhe
Ni de zhu bi wei tasuo yiyu zhe er shi jiyang fuyu, bi wei tasuo yiyu zhe er shi jiyang jiongpo. Ni de zhu duiyu ta de zhong pu, que shi che zhi de, que shi mingcha de
Nimen buyao yinwei pa pinqiong er shahai ziji de ernu, wo gongji tamen he nimen. Shahai tamen que shi dazui
Nimen buyao jiejin si tong, yinwei si tong que shi xialiu de shi, zhe xingjing zhen elie
Nimen buyao weibei an la de jinling er sharen, chufei yinwei zhengyi. Wugu'er bei sha zhe, wo yi ba quanbing shouyu ta de qinqi, dan tamen buke lan sha, tamen que shi shou yuanzhu de
Nimen buyao jiejin gu er de caichan, chufei yizhao zui youliang de fangshi, zhidao ta chengnian. Nimen yingdang luxing nuoyan; nuoyan que shi yao bei shenwen de shi
Dang nimen mai liang de shihou, yingdang liang zu fenliang, nimen yingdang shiyong gongping de cheng cheng huowu, zhe shi shanshi, shi jieju zui you de
Ni buyao suicong ni suo bu zhidao de yanxing, ermu he xinling dou shi yao bei shenwen de
Ni buyao jiao'ao ziman di zai dadishang xingzou, ni jue buneng ba dadi ta chuan, jue buneng yu shan bi gao
Zhexie shi, qi elie shi ni de zhu suo yanwu de
Zhe shi ni de zhu suo qishi ni de zhihui, ni buyao shi renhe shenming yu an la tong shou chongbai, fouze, ni jiang zai shou zebei he zao qi jue de qingkuang xia bei touru huo yu
Nandao nimen de zhu ba nan'er shangci nimen, er yi zhong tianshi wei ziji de nu'er ma? Nimen dique shuo chu huangmiu dehua
Zai zhe bu “gulanjing” li, wo que yi fanfu shenshu zhege zongzhi, yibian tamen mingji. Zhe zhong shenshu zhi hui shi tamen gengjia zengwu
Ni shuo:“Jiaruo you xuduo shenming he ta zai yiqi, youru tamen suo shuo di nayang, name, naxie shenling biding xiangfa shefa yu baozuo de zhu zheng heng.”
Zansong an la, chaojue wanwu, ta jue ran chao hu tamen suo shuo de
Qi ceng tian he da di, yiji wan you, dou zansong ta chaojue wanwu, wu yi wu bu zansong ta chaojue wanwu. Dan nimen bu liaojie tamen de zansong. Ta que shi rongren de, que shi zhi she de
Dang ni songdu “gulanjing” de shihou, wo zai ni he buxin houshi zhe zhi jian anzhi yidao yin wei de pingzhang
Wo zai tamen de xin shang jiale xuduo zhaozi, yimian tamen liaojie “gulanjing”; you zai tamen de er li zao zhong'er, dang ni zai “gulanjing” li zhi ti dao ni de zhu de shihou, tamen zengwu de li qu
Wo zui zhidao tamen weihe yao qingting ni song jing, dangshi tamen lai qingting ni song jing, bingqie mimi de tanhua. Dangshi bu yi zhemen shuo:“Nimen zhishi shuncong yige zhongle moshu de ren.”
Ni kan tamen wei ni dale xuduo biyu, dan tamen dou mi wule, tamen buneng huode yitiao chulu
Tamen shuo:“Women bian cheng kugu he chentu hou, nandao women huan yiding bei fuhuo chengwei xinren ma
Ni shuo:“Jinguan nimen bian cheng shitou, huo tie kuai

huo nimen renwei geng nanyu jieshou shengming de shenme dongxi.” Tamen jiang shuo:“Shei shi women fuhuo ne?” Ni shuo:“Chuci chuangzao nimen de zhu.” Tamen jiang dui ni yaotou shuo:“Zhe jian shi jiang zai he shi fachu ne?” Ni shuo:“Zhe jian shi huoxu shi linjin de.”
Zai na ri, ta jiang zhaohuan nimen, er nimen jiang yi rongci daying ta. Nimen jiang caixiang ziji zai fenmu li zhi douliule yihui'er
Ni gaosu wo de purenmen shuo: Jiao tamen shuo zhe ju zui youmei dehua——emo biding yao lijian tamen, emo que shi renlei de ming di——
“nimen de zhu shi zui zhidao nimen de, ta yao lianmin nimen jiu lianmin nimen; ta yao chengfa nimen jiu chengfa nimen.” Wo mei paiqian ni zuo tamen de jianhu zhe
Ni de zhu shi zui zhidao tiandi wanwu de. Wo que yi shi yibufen xianzhi chaoyue ling yibufen; wo ceng ba jingdian “zai bu'er” shangci da wu de
Ni shuo:“Nimen she an la er cheng wei shenming zhe, nimen qidao tamen ba! Tamen buneng ti nimen xiao zai, ye buneng ti nimen jia huo

Tamen suo cheng wei shenming zhe, ziji qiu jin zhu zhi jie. Bi tamen geng jin yu zhu zhe ye qiu jin zhu zhi jie, tamen xiwang zhu de enhui, weiju zhu de xingfa. Ni de zhu de xingfa shi yinggai fangbei de
Yiqie shi zhen, zai fuhuo ri zhiqian, wo du yao jiayi huimie, huo jiayi yanli de chengfa, zhe shi jilu zai tian jing li de.”
Wo bu jiang shi jixiang, na shi yinwei qian ren dou bu chengren ta, wo ceng yi mu tuo gei sai mo de ren zuo mingzheng, dan tamen pohaile ta. Wo jiang jixiang zhishi weile donghe

Dangshi, wo ceng dui ni shuo:“Ni de zhu shi zhouzhi zhongren de. Wo suo zhaoshi ni de meng zhao he zai “gulanjing” li suo zuzhou di na ke shu, wo zhi yi zhe liang jian shiwu kaoyan zhongren, bing jiayi donghe, dan wo de donghe zhi neng shi tamen gengjia manheng.”
Dangshi wo ceng dui zhong tianshi shuo:“Nimen yingdang xiang a dan koutou.” Tamen jiu xiang ta koutou. Dan yi bo lie si chuwai. Ta shuo:“Ni yong nitu zaocheng de, wo zen neng xiang ta koutou ne!”
Ta shuo:“Ni gaosu wo ba, zhe jiushi ni shi ta chaoyue wo de ren ma? Ruguo ni kuanxian wo dao fuhuo ri, wo shi bi genjue ta de houyi, dan shaoshu ren chuwai.”
An la shuo:“Ni qu ba! Tamen zhong fan shuncong ni de, huo yu biding shi tamen he ni de chongfen de baochou

Ni keyi yong ni de shengyin qu donghe tamen zhong ni suo neng donghe de ren; ni keyi tongshuai ni de qibing he bubing, qu fandui tamen; ni keyi he tamen tong xiang tamen de caichan he ernu; ni keyi xu gei tamen renhe dongxi——emo zhi xu gei tamen wangxiang——
wo de pu ren, ni dui tamen meiyou renhe quanbing, ni de zhu zu wei jianhu zhe.”
Nimen de zhu wei nimen er shi chuanzhi zai haishang hangxing, yibian nimen xunqiu ta de enhui. Ta dui nimen que shi zhi ci de

Dang nimen zai haishang zaoshou zaihai de shihou, nimen xianglai suo qidao de yi huibi nimenle, er nimen zhiyou qidao zhule. Dangzhu shi nimen ping'an denglu de shihou, nimen beipanle zhu. Ren yuan shi gu en de
Nandao nimen bupa zhu shi nimen lunxian dixia, huo shi feishazoushi de kuangfeng saodang nimen, er nimen buneng wei ziji zhaodao jianhu zhe ma
Nandao nimen bupa zhu shi nimen zai qu hanghai, er shi kuangfeng xiji nimen, shi nimen yin gu en er chenni, ranhou, nimen buneng wei ziji zhaodao renhe dui zhu baochou zhe ma
Wo que yi youdai a dan de houyi, er shi tamen zai lu shang he haishang du you suo qi cheng, wo yi jiamei de shiwu gongji tamen, wo shi tamen dada di chaoguo wo suo chuangzao de xuduo ren
(Ni ji zhu), zai na ri, wo jiang zhaohuan mei ge minzu ji qi biaoshuai. Yi youshou jieshou qi gongguo bao zhe, jiang yuedu ziji de benzi; tamen bu shou yi sihao kui she
Zai jinshi shi mangren zhe, zai houshi reng shi mangren, erqie gengjia mi wu
Tamen que yi shi ni jihu weibei wo suo qishi de jiaoxun, yibian ni jiajie wo de mingyi, er niezao qita de jiaoxun. Name, tamen jiu hui ba ni dang pengyoule
Yao bushi wo shi ni jianding, ni jihu yi qingxiang yu tamenle
Ruguo nayang, wo bi shi ni zai shengqian changshi jiabei de xingfa, zai si hou changshi jiabei de xingfa, shi ni buneng zhaodao renhe ren bangzhu ni lai duikang wo
Tamen que yi shi ni jihu buneng anju guxiang, yibian ba ni zhu chu jingwai. Ruguo nayang, tamen zai ni bei zhu chu zhihou, zhide douliu yihui'er
Zhe shi zai ni zhiqian wo suo paiqian de zhong shizhe de changdao, ni duiyu wo de changdao buneng faxian renhe de biangeng
Ni yingdang jin shou cong chen shi dao heiye de bai gong; bing yingdang jin shou zaochen bai de songdu, zaochen bai de songdu que shi bei (tianshi) canjia de
zai yeli de yiduan shijian, ni yingdang jin shou ni suo dang shou de fujia de bai gong, ni de zhu huoxu ba ni tisheng dao yige zhide chengsong di diwei
Ni shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni shi wo shunli er ru, qiu ni shi wo shunli er chu, qiu ni shangci wo cong ni nali fachu de quanbing, yi zuo wo de fubi.”
Ni shuo:“Zhenli yijing laile, xuwang yi xiaomiele; xuwang que shi yi mie de”
wo jiang shi keyi wei xinshimen zhiliao he gei tamen yi enhui de “gulanjing”, ta zhi hui shi bu xindao zhe gengjia kui she
Dang wo shi en yu ren de shihou, ta diaotou bugu; dang zaoyu huohuan de shihou, ta bian cheng juewang de
Ni shuo:“Ge ren yi ziji de fangfa er gongzuo, nimen de zhu zui zhidao shei shi geng jin yu zhengdao de.”
Tamen wen ni jingshen shi shenme? Ni shuo:“Jingshen shi wo de zhu de jimi.” Nimen zhi huode hen shao de zhishi
Ruguo wo yiyu, wo shi bi ba wo qishi ni de “gulanjing” xiaomie jingjin, ranhou, ni dui wo buneng faxian renhe jianhu zhe
Dan wo wei cong ni de zhu fachu de enhui (cai baocun ta), ni de zhu suo shi yu ni de enhui shi zhongda de
Ni shuo:“Ruguo renlei he jingling lianhe qilai chuangzao yi bu xiang zheyang de “gulanjing”, name, tamen jishi huxiang bangzhu, ye bi buneng chuangzao xiang zheyang de miao wen.”
Zai zhe bu “gulanjing” li, wo wei zhongren que yi shenshu ge zhong biyu, dan zhongren daban buxin
Tamen shuo:“Women jue buxin ni, zhidao ni wei women er shi yidao yuanquan cong dixia yong chu
huozhe ni youyizuo yuanpu, zhongzhizhe ye zao he putao, ni shi heliu guanchuan qijian
huozhe ni shi tian ru ni suo shuo di nayang, yikuai kuai di luo zai women de tou shang; huozhe ni qing'an la he zhong tianshi lai zuo baozheng

huozhe ni you yi suo huangjin wu; huozhe ni sheng shangtian qu, women jue buxin ni que yi shengtian, zhidao ni jiang shi women suo neng yuedu de jingdian.” Ni shuo:“Zansong wo de zhu chaojue wanwu! Wo zhishi yige ceng feng shiming de fanren.”
Dang zhengdao jianglin zhongren de shihou, fang'ai tamen xindao de zhishi tamen de zhe ju hua:“Nandao an la paiqian yige fanren lai zuo shizhe ma?”
Ni shuo:“Jiaruo da dishang you xuduo tianshi anran buxing, name, wo bi cong tianshang jiangxia yige tianshi qu tamen nali zuo shizhe.”
Ni shuo:“An la zu wei wo yu nimen zhi jian de jianzheng, ta duiyu ta de pu renmen que shi che zhi de, que shi mingcha de.”

An la yindao shei, shei jiushi zunxun zhengdao de; an la shi shei mi wu, ni buneng wei shei faxian an la yiwai de baohu zhe. Zai fuhuo ri, wo jiang shi tamen you xia you ya you long de pufuzhe jihe qilai, tamen de guisu shi huo yu. Mei dang huoshi jianruo de shihou, wo zengjia tamen de huoyan
Zhe shi tamen de baochou, yinwei tamen buxin wo de jixiang, bingqie shuo:“Women bian cheng kugu he chentu hou, nandao women yiding hui bei fuhuo cheng xinren ma?”
Nandao tamen bu zhidao ma? Chuangzaole tiandi wanwu de an la neng chuangzao xiang tamen nayang de ren, bing neng wei tamen queding yige hao wu keyi de qixian, bu yi de renmen zhi yuan buxin
Ni shuo:“Jiaruo wo de zhu de enhui de kucang gui nimen guanli, name, nimen biding yinwei pa kaizhi er kouliu ta de enhui. Ren shi linse de.”

Dang mu sa lailin yiselie ren de shihou, wo que yi shangci mu sa jiu zhong mingxian de jixiang. Ni wen yi wen yiselie ren ba, falao dui ta shuo:“Mu sa a! Wo dique caixiang ni shi zhongle moshu de ren.”
Ta shuo:“Ni queshi zhidao, zhiyou tiandi de zhu neng jiang shi zhexie zuowei mingzheng. Falao a! Wo dique caixiang ni shi yao huimie de.”
Ta yao ba tamen zhu chu jingwai, dan wo shi ta he ta de jundui tongtong yan si
Zai ta miewang zhihou, wo dui yiselie ren shuo:“Nimen juzhu zhege difang ba! Dang houshi de yue qi lailin de shihou, wo yao ba nimen zada de zhaoji lai.”
Wo zhi ben zhenli er jiang shi “gulanjing”, er “gulanjing” ye zhi han zhenli er jiangxia. Wo zhi paiqian ni zuo baoxi xinzhe he jinggao zhe
Zhe shi yi bu “gulanjing”, wo shi ta yiyi mingbai, yibian ni congrongbupo di dui zhongren xuandu ta; wo zhujian de jiang shi ta
Ni shuo:“Nimen keyi xinyang ta, ye keyi bu xinyang ta.” Zai jiang shi ta zhiqian huode zhishi de renmen, dang ting dao renmen songdu ta de shihou, tamen fufu koutou
Tamen shuo:“Zansong women de zhu chaojue wanwu! Women de zhu de nuoyan biding yao bei luxing.”
Tamen tongkuzhe fufu xiaqu,“gulanjing” shi tamen geng gongjing

(Ni shuo):“Nimen keyi cheng ta wei an la, ye ke cheng ta wei zhiren zhu. Yinwei ta you xuduo ji youmei de ming hao, nimen wulun yong shenme ming hao chenghu ta,(dou shi hen hao de).” Ni zai bai zhong buyao gao sheng langdu, ye buyao di sheng modu, ni yingdang xunqiu yitiao shizhong de daolu
Ni shuo:“Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la, ta meiyou shouyang ernu, meiyou tong ta gongxiang zhuquan de, meiyou wei mian beijian er she de fuzhu zhe. Ni yingdang zansong ta de zunda.”
Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la! Ta yi duanzheng de jingdian jiang shi ta de puren, er wei zai qizhong zhizao renhe pian xie
yibian ta jinggao shiren, an la yao jiangxia yanli de chengfa; bing yugao xingshan de xinshimen, tamen de shou youmei de baochou
er yong ju qizhong
qie jinggao wangyan “an la shouyang ernu” de ren
Tamen he tamen de zuxian, duiyu zhe ju hua dou hao wu zhishi, tamen xinkoukaihe de shuo zhe ju huangmiu juelun dehua
Ruguo tamen buxin zhe xun ci, zai tamen beili zhihou, ni huoxu wei beishang er zisha
Wo que yi shi dadishang de yiqie shiwu chengwei dadi de zhuangshi pin, yibian wo kaoyan shiren, kan shei de gongzuo shi zui youmei de
Wo bi huimie da dishang de yiqie shiwu, er shi da di bian wei huangliang de
Nandao ni yiwei yandong he beiwen de zhuren shi wo de jixiang zhong de yi jian qi shi ma
Dangshi, you ji ge qingnian bi ju shandong zhong, tamen shuo: Women de zhu a! Qiu ni ba ni nali de enhui shangci women, qiu ni shi women de shiye wanquan duanzheng
Wo jiu shi tamen zai shandong li ji nian buneng tingwen
Houlai wo shi tamen suxing, yibian wo zhidao liang pai zhong de na yipai geng neng jisuan tamen suo tingliu de shijian
Wo ba tamen de gushi, chengshi di gaosu ni, tamen shi ji ge qingnian, tamen xinyang tamen de zhu, er wo gei tamen zengjia zhengdao
Wo ceng shi tamen de xin jianren. Dangshi, tamen zhan qilai shuo:“Women de zhu, shi tiandi de zhu, women jue bu she ta er qidao renhe shenming, fouze, women biding shuo chu bu jin qingli dehua

Women de zhexie tongzu, she tamen er chongbai bie de xuduo shenming, tamen zenme buyong yige mingzheng lai zhengshi naxie shenming shi ying shou bai de ne? Jiajie an la de mingyi er zaoyao de ren, you shei bi tamen hai bu yi ne?”
Dang nimen liqi tamen he tamen she an la er chongbai de shenming, ke bi ju shandong, nimen de zhujiang dui nimen guang shi enhui——shi nimen de shiye wei youli de

Ni kan taiyang chulai de shihou, cong tamen de shandong de youbian xieshe guoqu; taiyang luoshan de shihou, cong tamen de zuobian xieshe guoqu, er tamen jiu zai shandong de kong chu. Zhe shi an la de yi zhong jixiang, an la yindao shei, shei jiu zunxun zhengdao; an la shi shei mi wu, ni jue buneng wei shei faxian renhe pengyou zuowei yindao zhe

Ni yiwei tamen shi juexing de, qishi tamen shi tian shui de, wo shi tamen zuoyou fanzhuan, tamen de gou shen zhao liang tiao tui wo zai dongkou. Ruguo ni kanjian tamen, ni bi xia de zhuan lian er tao, manhuai kongbu

Wo ruci shi tamen juexing, yibian tamen huxiang xunwen, qizhong youyigeren shuo:“Nimen douliule duojiu?” Tamen shuo:“Women douliule yitian, huozhe bu dao yitian.” Tamen shuo:“Nimen de zhu shi zui qingchu nimen douliu de shijian de. Nimen ziji pai yi ge ren, daizhe nimen de zhexie yinbi dao cheng li qu, kan kan shei jia de shipin zui qingjie, jiao ta maidian shipin lai gei nimen, yao jiao ta hen jinshen, buyao shi renhe ren zhidao nimen
Cheng li de ren, ruguo ren chu nimen lai, jiu hui yong shitou da si nimen, huozhe qiangpo nimen xinfeng tamen de zongjiao, name, nimen jiu yong bu hui chenggongle.”

Wo zheyang shi bieren kuijian tamen, yibian tamen zhidao an la de nuoyan shi zhenshi de, fuhuo de shike shi hao wu keyi de. Dangshi tamen wei ci shi er zhenglun, tamen shuo:“Nimen zai tamen de sizhou xiuyi du weiqiang——tamen de zhu shi zui liaojie tamen de!” Zhuchi shiwu de ren shuo:“Women biding zai tamen de sizhou jianzhu yi suo libaisi.”

Youren jiang shuo:“Tamen shi san ge, di si ge shi tamen de gou.” Youren jiang shuo:“Tamen shi wu ge, di liu ge shi tamen de gou.” Zhe shi youyu caice youxuan. Hai youren jiang shuo:“Tamen shi qi ge, di ba ge shi tamen de gou.” Ni shuo:“Wo de zhu shi zui zhidao tamen de shumu di.” Ciwai, zhiyou shaoshu ren zhidao. Guanyu tamen de shiqing, ni zhi ke zuo biaomian de bianlun, guanyu tamen de shiqing, ni buyao qingjiao renhe ren
Ni buyao wei mou shi er shuo:“Mingtian wo yiding zuo na jian shi.”
Chufei tongshi shuo:“Ruguo an la yiyu.” Ni ruguo wangle, jiu yingdang jiyi qi ni de zhu, bingqie shuo:“Wo de zhu huoxu zhishi wo bi zhe geng qiejin de zhengdao.”
Tamen zai shandong li douliule sanbai nian, tamen you jia jiu nian

An la shi zui zhidao tamen douliu de shijian de. Wei you ta zhidao tiandi de youxuan. Ta de shijue zhen ming! Ta de tingjue zhen cong! Chu an la wai, tamen jue wu yuanzhu zhe, an la bu rang renhe ren shen yu ta de panjue
Ni yingdang xuandu ni de zhu suo qishi gei ni de jingdian, ta de yanci, jue bushi renhe ren suo neng biangeng de. Ni jue buneng faxian yige yinbi suo

Zaowan qidao ziji de yang zhu, yuqiu qi enci he xiyue de renmen, ni dang naixin de yu tamen xiangchu, buyao miaoshi tamen, er qiu jinshi shenghuo de fuhua. Wo shi mou xie ren de xin hushi wo de jiaoxun, er shuncong ziji de yuwang. Tamen de xingwei shi guofen de, zhe zhong ren ni buyao shuncong tamen

Ni shuo:“Zhenli shi cong nimen de zhu jiang shi de, shei yuan xindao jiu rang ta xin ba, shei bu yuan xindao, jiu rang ta buxin ba.” Wo yi wei bu yi de ren, yubeile liehuo, na liehuo de yanmu jiang longzhao tamen. Ruguo tamen (wei gan ke er) qiujiu, jiu yi yi zhong shui gong tamen jieke, na zhong shui xiang liqing nayang shaozhuo ren mian, na yinliao zhen zaogao! Na guisu zhen elie
Xindao erqie xingshan zhe, wo bi bu shi tamen de shanxing tulao wu chou

zhe deng ren de xiangshou changzhu de leyuan, tamen xia lin zhu he, tamen zai leyuan li, pei jin zhi de shouzhuo, chuan ling luo jinduan de lu pao, kao zai chuangshang. Na baochou, zhen youmei! Na guisu, zhen meihao
Ni yi liang geren de qingkuang wei tamen da yige biyu. Wo wei qizhong de yige chuangzaole liang ge putao yuan, er wei yi ye zao lin, bingqie yi liang yuan zhi jian di difang wei gengdi
liang yuan dou chuchan guoshi, hao bu qianque, bing zai liang yuan zhi jian, kaizao yitiao he
Ta fuyou caichan, gu yi jinkua de taidu, dui ta de pengyou shuo:“Wo caichan bi ni duo, ren bi ni qiang.”
Ta zifu de zou jin ziji de yuanpu, shuo:“Wo xiang zhege yuanpu yong bu huangwu
wo xiang fuhuo shike bu hui lailin. Jishi wo bei zhao gui zhu, wo ye neng faxian bi zhe yuanpu geng hao de guisu.”
Ta de pengyou yi bianbo de taidu dui ta shuo: Ni buxin zaowuzhu ma? Ta chuangzao ni, xian yong nitu, ji yong jingye, ranhou shi ni bian cheng yige wanzheng de nanzi
Danshi, an la shi wo de zhu, wo bu yi renhe wu pei wo de zhu
Ni zou jin ni de yuanpu de shihou, ni zenme bu shuo:‘Zhe jian shi shi an la yiyu de. Chu an la wai, wo jue wu nengli!’ Ruguo ni renwei wo de caichan he housi dou buru ni
name, wo de zhu huoxu hui shangci wo bi ni de yuanpu geng hao de dongxi, er jiang pili yu ni de yuanpu, yizhi (ta) hua wei guangtutu de tudi
huo yuan li de shui yidan ganhe, ni jiu buneng xunqiu.”

Ta de caichan, quan zao huimie. Yuan li de putao jia daota zai dishang, ta wei tongxi jianshe yuanpu de feiyong er fanfu fanzhuan ta de liang zhang, ta shuo:“Dan yuan wo meiyou ba renhe wu pei wo de zhu.”
Chu an la wai, meiyou qunzhong yuanzhu ta, ta ye buneng zizhu
Zai zheli, yuanzhu quan gui zhenshi de an la, ta shi shangfa yanming de
Ni wei tamen da yige bifang: Jinshi de shenghuo, youru wo cong tianshang jiangxia yushui, zhiwu de yu, jiu pengbo shengzhang, ji'er lingluo, sui feng piaosan. An la duiyu wanshi shi quanneng de
Caichan he housi shi jinshi shenghuo de zhuangshi: Chang cun de shangong, zai ni de zhu kan lai, shi baochou geng hao de, shi xiwang geng da de
Zai na ri, wo jiang shi shanyue xiaoshi, ni kan dadi bian cheng guangtutu de. Wo jiang jihe tamen, er bu yilou renhe ren

Tamen jiang fen lie chengxing di jieshou ni de zhu de jianyue. Nimen que yi lai jian wo, youru wo chuci chuangzao nimen de shihou yiyang. Buran, nimen ceng shuo wo jue bu wei nimen queding yige yue qi

Gongguo bao jiang zhanxian chulai, suoyi, ni jiang hui kan dao zui renmen weiju qizhong de jilu. Tamen shuo:“Aya! Zhege gongguo bao zenme la, bulun dazui xiao zui, dou hao bu yilou, yiqie dou jiayi jilu.” Tamen jiang faxian ziji suo zuo de shi dou yiyi jilu zai benzi shang. Ni de zhu bu kui wang renhe ren

Dangshi, wo dui zhong tianshi shuo:“Nimen yingdang xiang a dan koutou.” Tamen dou koule tou, dan yi bo lie si chuwai. Ta ben shi jingling, suoyi weibei ta de zhu de mingling. Ta he ta de zisun, shi nimen de choudi, nimen que she wo er yi tamen wei baohu zhe ma? Bu yi zhe de daoxingnishi zhen elie
Wo meiyou shi tamen yanjian tiandi de chuangzao, ye meiyou shi tamen yanjian qi zishen de chuangzao, wo meiyou ba shi ren mi wu zhe dangzuo zhushou
Zai na ri, an la jiang shuo:“Nimen suo cheng wei wo de huoji de, nimen ba tamen zhaohuan lai ba.” Tamen jiu zhaohuan naxie tongshi, dan tamen bu daying. Wo jiang shi tamen tongguiyujin
Zuifanmen jiang kanjian huo yu, bi duo ru qizhong, wu chu taobi
Zai zhe “gulanjing” li, wo que yi wei zhongren chanshule ge zhong biyu, ren shi zhengbian zuiduo de

Dang zhengdao lailin zhongren de shihou, tamen buxindao, ye bu xiang tamen de zhu qiurao, na zhishi yinwei tamen yao dengdai (an la jiang) guren de changdao xianxian yu tamen, huo yanjian xingfa lailin tamen
Wo zhi paiqian shizhemen baoxi xin chuan jinggao, er bu xindao de renmen que yi wangyan xiang zhenglun, yu jie ci fanbo zhenli. Tamen ba wo de jixiang he dui tamen de jinggao, dangzuo xiaobing

Youren yi zhu de jixiang jiaohui tamen, dan tamen biqi ta, bingqie wangji tamen yiqian suo fan de zui'e; you shei bi tamen hai bu yi ne? Wo que yi jiang bomo jia zai tamen de xin shang, yimian tamen liaojie jing yi, bingqie zai tamen de er li zao zhong ting. Ruguo ni zhao tamen yu zhengdao, name, tamen jiang yong bu zunxun zhengdao

Ni de zhu que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de. Jiaruo ta wei tamen suo fan de zui'e er chengzhi tamen, name, ta bi wei tamen er cujin xingfa de lailin, dan tamen you ge dingqi, tamen dui nage dingqi, jue buneng huode yige binan suo
Naxie shi zhen de jumin duo xing bu yi de shihou, wo huimie tamen, wo wei tamen de huimie er yuding yige qixian
Dangshi, mu sa dui ta de tongpu shuo:“Wo jiang bu ting bu, zhidao wo daoda liang hai xiangjiao chu, huo jixu luxing ruogan nian.”
Dang ta lia daoda liang hai xiang jiaojie chu de shihou, wangjile ta lia de yu, na wei yu bian ruhai youran er qu
Dang ta lia zou guoqu de shihou, ta dui ta de tongpu shuo:“Na zaofan lai chi! Women queshi pijuanle.”
Ta shuo:“Ni gaosu wo ba, dang women daoda na zuo panshi xia xiuxi de shihou, wo que yi wangjile na wei yu——zhi yin emo wo cai wangjile gaosu ni,——na wei yu ruhai er qu, na zhenshi guaishi!”
Ta shuo:“Zhe zheng shi women suo xunqiu de.” Ta lia jiu yi lai shi de zuji zhuanshen huiqu
Ta lia faxian wo de yige puren, wo yi ba cong wo zheli fachu de enhui shangci ta, wo yi ba cong wo zheli fachu de zhishi chuanshou gei ta
Mu sa dui ta shuo:“Wo yao zhuisui ni, xiwang ni ba ni suo xue de de zhengdao chuanshou wo. Hao ma?”
Ta shuo:“Ni buneng naixin di he wo zai yiqi
Ni meiyou chedi renshi de shiqing ni zenme neng renshou ne?”
Mu sa shuo:“Ruguo an la yiyu, ni jiang faxian wo shi jianren de, bu hui weikang ni de renhe mingling.”
Ta shuo:“Ruguo ni zhuisui wo, name,(yu shi) buyao wen wo shenme daoli, deng wo ziji jiang gei ni ting.”

Ta lia jiu tongxing, daole cheng chuan de shihou, ta ba chuan zaole yige dong, mu sa shuo:“Ni ba chuan zaole yige dong, yao xiang shi chuan li de ren yan si ma? Ni que yi zuole yi jian beimiu de shi!”
Ta shuo:“Wo meiyou dui ni shuoguo ma? Ni buneng naixin he wo zai yiqi.”
Mu sa shuo:“Gangcai wo wangle ni de zhufu, qing ni buyao zebei wo, buyao yi wo suo da nan de shi zebei wo!”
Ta lia you tongxing, houlai yujianle yige er tong, ta jiu ba nage er tong shale, mu sa shuo:“Ni zenme wang sha wugu de ren ne? Ni que yi zuole yi jian xiong'e de shi!”
Ta shuo:“Nandao wo meiyou dui ni shuoguo ma? Ni buneng naixin di he wo zai yiqi.”
Mu sa shuo:“Cihou, ruguo wo zai wen ni shenme daoli, ni jiu keyi buxu wo zai zhuisui ni, ni duiyu wo, zongsuan renzhiyijinle.”

Ta lia you tongxing, lai daole yige chengshi, jiu xiang cheng li de jumin qiu shi, tamen bu ken kuandai. Houlai ta lia zai cheng li faxian yi du qiang kuaiyao daotale, ta jiu ba na du qiang xiuli haole, mu sa shuo:“Ruguo ni yiyu, ni bi wei zhe jian gongzuo er suoqu gongqian.”
Ta shuo:“Wo he ni congci zuobiele. Ni suo buneng renshou di naxie shi, wo jiang gaosu ni qizhong de daoli
Zhiyu na zhi chuan, ze shi haili gongzuo de ji ge qiongren de, wo yao shi chuan you quexian, shi yinwei tamen de qianmian you yige guowang, yaoqiang zheng yiqie chuanzhi
Zhiyu nage er tong, ze ta de fumu dou shi xindao zhe, women pa ta yi beini he bu xin qiangjia yu ta de fumu
Suoyi women yao ta lia de zhu ling shangci ta lia yige geng chunjie, geng xiaojing de erzi

Zhiyu na du qiang, ze shi chengzhong liang ge gu'er de; qiang xia you ta lia de caibao. Ta lia de fuqin, yuan shi shanliang de. Ni de zhuyao zai ta lia chengnian hou, quchu ta lia de caibao, zhe shi shuyu ni de zhu de enhui, wo meiyou suizhe wo de siyu zuo zhe jian shi. Zhe shi ni suo buneng renshou de shiqing de daoli.”
Tamen xunwen zuo lei gai er naiying de gushi, ni shuo:“Wo jiang dui nimen xushu youguan ta de yige baogao.”
Wo que yi shi ta zai da dishang deshi, wo shangci ta chuli wanshi de tujing
Ta jiu zunxun yitiao tujing

zhidao ta daodale riluo zhi chu, ta juede taiyang shi luo zai hei ni yuan zhong, ta zai na hei ni yuan pang faxian yi zhong ren. Wo shuo:“Zuo lei gai er naiying a! Ni huo chengzhi tamen, huo shandai tamen.”
Ta shuo:“Zhiyu bu yi zhe, wo jiang chengfa ta, ranhou ta de zhuzai jiang ba ta zhao qu, jiayi yanli chengchu
Zhiyu xindao erqie xingshan zhe, jiang xiangshou zui youhou de baochou, wo jiang mingling ta zuo jianyi de shiqing.”
Suihou ta you zunxun yitiao lu
yizhi zou dao ri chu zhi chu, ta faxian taiyang zheng shaizhe yi zhong ren, wo meiyou gei tamen fang ri shai de gongju
Shishi jiu xiang shuo di nayang. Wo yi che zhi ta yongyouyiqie
Suihou, ta you zunxun yitiao lu
yizhi dao ta daoda liang shan zhi jian de shihou, ta faxian qianmian you yi zhong ren, jihu bu dong (ta de) hua
Tamen shuo:“Zuo lei gai er naiying a! Ya zhu zhe he ma zhu zhe, dique zai difang shang daoluan, women xiang ni jingong, wu qing ni zai women he tamen zhi jian jianzhu yizuo bilei, hao ma?”
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu shi wo nenggou xiangshou de, youwei youmei. Nimen yi renli fuzhu wo, wo jiu zai nimen he tamen zhi jian jianzhu yizuo bilei

Nimen na tie kuai lai gei wo ba.” Daole ta dui man liang shan zhi jian de shihou, ta shuo:“Nimen la fengxiang ba.” Daole ta shi tie kuai hong ru huoyan de shihou, ta shuo:“Nimen na rong tong lai gei wo, wo jiu ba ta qingzhu zai bilei shang.”
Tamen jiu buneng pandeng, ye buneng zao kong
Ta shuo:“Zhe shi cong wo de zhu jiangxia de enhui, dang wo de zhu de yingxu jianglin de shihou, ta jiang shi zhe bilei hua wei pingdi. Wo de zhu de yingxu shi zhenshi de.”
Na ri, wo jiang shi tamen zhixu wenluan. Haojiao yi xiang, wo jiu ba tamen wanquan jihe qilai
Zai na ri, wo yao ba huo yu chenlie zai buxindao zhe de mianqian
Tamen de yan zai yi zi zhong, buneng kan dao wo de jiaohui, tamen buneng tingcong
Nandao buxindao zhe, renwei keyi she wo er yi wo de zhong pu wei baohu zhe ma? Wo que yi yubei huo yu wei bu xindao zhe de zhaodaisuo
Ni shuo:“Wo gaosu nimen zai hang wei fangmian zui chikui de ren, hao ma
Tamen jiushi zai jinshi shenghuo zhong tulaowugong, er renwei ziji shi shoufa qiaomiao de ren.”
Zhe deng ren bu xin tamen de zhu de jixiang, ye bu xin jiang yu ta xiang hui, suoyi tamen zai jinshi shenghuo zhong de shangong bian wei wuxiao de, fuhuo ri wo bu wei tamen shuli quanheng
Tamen de baochou shi huo yu, yinwei tamen bu xindao, bingqie ba wo de jixiang he shizhe dangzuo xiaobing
Xindao erqie xingshan zhe, deyi leyuan wei zhaodaisuo
bing yong ju qizhong, bu yuan qian chu
Ni shuo:“Jiaruo yi haishui wei mozhi, yong lai jizai wo de zhu de yanci, name, haishui biding yong jin, er wo de zhu de yanci shangwei qiongjin, jishi women yi tong liang di haishui buchong zhi.”

Ni shuo:“Wo zhishi yige tong nimen yiyang de fanren, wo feng de qishi shi: Nimen suo yingdang chongbai de, zhishi yige zhuzai, gu shei xiwang yu ta de zhu xiang hui, jiu jiao shei li xingshan gong, jiao shei buyao yi renhe wu yu ta de zhu shou tongyang de chongbai.”
Ka fu, ha, ya, a yin, sa de
Zhe shi xushu ni de zhu duiyu ta de puren zai kai li ya de enhui
Dangshi, ta di sheng di huyu ta de zhu shuo
“Wo de zhu a! Wo de guge yi ruanruole, wo yi bai fa cangcangle, wo de zhu a! Wo meiyou wei qidao ni er shiwang
Wo dique danxin wo si hou tang dixiongmen buneng jicheng wo de zhiwei, wo de qizi you shi bu hui shengyu de, qiu ni shangci wo yige er zi
lai jicheng wo, bingqie jicheng ye er gu bai de bufen houyi. Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni shi ta chengwei kexi de.”
“Zai kai li ya a! Wo biding yi yige er zi xiang ni baoxi, ta de mingzi shi ye ha ya, wo yiqian meiyou shi renhe ren yu ta tongming.”
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo de qizi shi bu hui shengyu de, wo ye laotailongzhongle, wo zenme hui you erzi ni?”
Zhu shuo:“Shiqing jiushi zheyang.” Ni de zhu shuo:“Zhe duiyu wo shi rongyi de. Yiqian ni bu cunzai, er wo chuangzaole ni.”
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni wei wo yuding yi zhong jixiang.” Ta shuo:“Ni de jixiang shi ni san zhouye jian buneng he ren shuohua.”
Ta cong bai dian li zou chulai jian ta de zuren, jiu anshi tamen:“Nimen yingdang zhaoxi zansong an la.”
“Ye ha ya a! Ni yingdang jianchi jingdian.” Ta zai tongnian shidai wo yi shangci ta zhihui
yu cong wo fachu de enhui he chunjie. Ta shi jingwei de
shi xiaojing ta de shuangqin de, bushi wuni de
Ta zai chusheng ri, siwang ri, fuhuo ri dou xiangshou heping
Ni yingdang zai zhe bu jingdian li ti ji mai er yan, dangri ta likaile jiashu dao dongbian yige difang
Ta yong yige weimu zhegaizhe, bu rang ren kanjian ta. Wo shi wo de jingshen dao ta mianqian, ta jiu dui ta xianxian cheng yige yunchen de ren
Ta shuo:“Wo dique qiu bi yu zhiren zhu, mian zao ni de qinfan, ruguo ni shi jingwei de.”
Ta shuo:“Wo zhishi ni de zhu de shizhe, wo lai gei ni yige chunjie de erzi.”
Ta shuo:“Renhe ren meiyou jiechuguo wo, wo you bushi shijie de, wo zenme hui you erzi ni?”
Ta shuo:“Shishi shi xiang zheyang de, ni de zhu shuo: Zhe duiyu wo shi rongyi de. Wo yao yi ta wei shiren de jixiang, wei cong wo fachu de enhui, zhe shi yijing panjue de shiqing.”
Ta jiu huaile yun, yushi ta tuibi dao yige pi yuan di difang
Zhentong poshi ta lai dao yi ke ye zao shu pang, ta shuo:“A! Dan yuan wo yiqian sile, erqie yi bian cheng bei ren yiwang de dongxi.”
Ye zao shu xia you shengyin hanjiao ta shuo:“Ni buyao youchou, ni de zhu yi zai ni de xiamian zaohuale yitiao xishui
Ni xiangzhe ni de fangxiang yaohan ye zao shu, jiu you xinxian de, chengshu de ye zao fenfen luo zai ni de mianqian
Ni chi ba, ni he ba, ni yukuai ba! Ruguo ni jian ren lai, ni keyi shuo:‘Wo que yi xiang zhiren zhu fayuan zhaijie, suoyi wo jue budui renhe ren shuohua’.”
Ta baozhe ying'er lai jian ta de zuren, tamen shuo:“Mai er yan a! Ni que yi zuole yi jian qi shi
Ha lun de meimei a! Ni fuqin bushi quede de, ni muqin bushi shijie de.”
Ta jiu zhi yi zhi nage ying'er, tamen shuo:“Women zen neng dui yaolan li de ying'er shuohua ne?”
Na ying'er shuo:“Wo que shi an la de puren, ta yao ba jingdian shangci wo, yao shi wo zuo xianzhi
yao shi wo wulun zai nali dou shi youfu de, bingqie zhufu wo, zhiyao huozhe jiu yao jin shou bai gong, wan na tian ke
(ta shi wo) xiaojing wo de muqin, ta meiyou shi wo zuo badao de, boming de ren
Wo zai chusheng zhi ri, siwang ri, fuhuo ri, dou xiangshou heping.”
Zhe jiushi mai er yan de erzi er sa, zhe shi tamen suo zhenglun de zhenli zhi yan
“An la bu hui shouyang erzi——zansong an la, chaojue wanwu——dang ta panjue yi jian shiqing de shihou, ta zhi dui na jian shi shuo:‘You’, ta jiu youle
An la que shi wo de zhu, ye que shi nimen de zhu, suoyi nimen yingdang chongbai ta. Zhe shi zhenglu.”
Dan ge pai zhi jian yijian fenqi. Zhongda ri lailin de shihou, bei'ai guiyu buxindao zhe
Tamen lai jian wo di na ri, tamen de er zhen cong, tamen de yan zhen ming, dan bu yi zhe, jintian que zai mingxian de mi wu zhong
Ni yingdang jinggao tamen huihen zhi ri, dangri yiqie shiqing yi bei panjue, er tamen xianzai hai zai shuhu zhi zhong. Tamen bu xin zhengdao
Wo biding jicheng dadi he da dishang de yiqie, tamen jiang guiyu wo
Ni yingdang zai zhe bu jingdian li ti ji yi bo la xin, ta yuan shi yige qiancheng de ren, you shi yige xianzhi
Dangshi ta dui ta fuqin shuo:“Wo de fuqin a! Ni weihe chongbai na ji buneng ting, you buneng jian, duiyu ni you meiyou renhe biyi de dongxi ne
Wo de fuqin a! Meiyou jianglin ni de zhishi, que yi jianglin wole; ni shuncong wo ba, wo yao zhishi ni yitiao zhenglu
Wo de fuqin a! Ni buyao chongbai emo, emo que shi weikang zhiren zhu de
Wo de fuqin a! Wo dique pa ni zaoshou cong zhiren zhu fachu de xingfa, er bian cheng emo de pengyou.”
Ta shuo:“Ni taoyan wo de zhuzai ma? Yi bo la xin a! Ruguo ni bu tingzhi, wo shi biyong shitou ji ni. Ni yingdang yuanli wo yige chang shiqi.”
Ta shuo:“Zhu ni ping'an! Wo jiang wei ni xiang wo de zhu qiurao, ta dui wo que shi renci de
Wo jiang tuibi nimen, yiji nimen she an la er qidao de. Wo jiang qidao wo de zhu, wo huoxu bu wei qidao wo de zhu er bian cheng boming de ren.”
Ta ji tuibi tamen, yiji tamen she an la er qidao de, wo jiu shangci ta yi si ha ge he ye er gu bai, wo shi ta lia chengwei xianzhi
wo ba wo de enhui shangci tamen, wo shi tamen xiangyou zhenshi de, chonggao de shengwang
Ni yingdang zai zhe bu jingdian li ti ji mu sa, ta que shi zhongcheng de, que shi shizhe, que shi xianzhi
Wo cong na zuo shan de youbian zhaohuan ta, wo jiao ta dao wo zheli lai mitan
Wo weile ci'ai er ba ta gege xianzhi ha lun gei ta zuo zhushou
Ni yingdang zai zhe bu jingdian li ti ji yi sima yi, ta que shi zhong chengnuo de, ta shi shizhe, you shi xianzhi
Ta yi bai gong he tian ke mingling ta de jiashu, ta zai ta de zhu nali shi kexi de
Ni yingdang zai zhe bu jingdian li ti ji yi de li si, ta shi yige laoshi ren, you shi yige xianzhi
wo ba ta tigao dao yige chonggao di diwei

An la ceng jiayi en chong de zhexie xianzhi, shuyu a dan de houyi, shuyu wo shi (tamen) yu nu ha tongzhougongji zhe de (houyi), shuyu yi bo la xin he yi si la yi de houyi, shuyu wo suo yindao erqie xuanba de ren, dui tamen xuandu zhiren zhu de qishi de shihou, tamen fufu xiaqu koutou he kuqi
Zai tamen qushi zhihou, you buxiao de houyi jichengle tamen, naxie houyi feiqi bai gong, shuncong shiyu, tamen jiang yu mi wu de e bao
Dan huizui er xindao, qie xingshan zhe chuwai, tamen jiang ru leyuan, bu shou sihao kuidai
Na shi changzhu de leyuan, shi zhiren zhu zai youxuan zhong yingxu qi zhong pu de, ta de nuoyan que shi yao luxing de
Tamen zai nalimian, ting bu dao xiantan, zhi ting dao zhuyuan ping'an; tamen zai nalimian, zhaoxi huode jiyang
Jiushi wo jiang shi zhong pu zhong de jingwei zhe jicheng de leyuan
Women wei feng ni de zhu de mingling er suishi jianglin, zai women mianqian de, zai women houmian de, yiji zai women qianhou zhi jian de (shiqing), ta dou zhidao. Ni de zhu shi bu wangji de
Ta shi tiandi wanwu de zhu, ni yingdang chongbai ta, ni yingdang naixin, ni zhidao ta you pidi ma
Ren shuo:“Wo si hou biyao fuhuo ma?”
Ren wangjile ma? Ta yiqian bushi shi you de, er wo chuangzaole ta
Zhi ni de zhu fashi, wo bi jiang tamen he zhong emo jihe qilai. Ranhou wo bi shi tamen gui zai huo yu de zhouwei
Ranhou wo bi cong mei yi zongpai zhong tichu dui zhiren zhu zui beini de ren
Ranhou, wo dique zhidao shei shi zui gai shou huoxing de
Nimen zhong meiyou yigeren bu dao huo yu de, na shi ni de zhu jueding yao shixing de
Ranhou, wo jiang zhengjiu jingwei zhe, er rang bu yi zhe gui zai na limian
Dui tamen xuandu wo de mingxian de jixiang de shihou, buxindao zhe dui xindao zhe shuo:“Na yipai di diwei geng youyue, huichang geng youmei ne?”
Zai tamen zhiqian, wo ceng huimiele xuduo shidai, wulun zichan he waiguan, dou bi tamen geng youmei

Ni shuo:“Zai mi wu zhong de ren yuan zhiren zhu yourong tamen, zhidao tamen de jian tamen ceng bei jinggao de: Bushi xingfa, jiushi fuhuo shi tamen jiu zhidao shei di diwei geng elie, shei de jundui geng nuoruole.”
An la jiang wei zunxun zhengdao zhe zengjia qi yindao. Chang cun de shangong, zai ni de zhu kan lai shi baochou geng hao, jieju geng shan de
Ni gaosu wo ba! Youren buxin wo de jixiang, queshuo:“Wo biyao huode caichan he zisi.”
Ta ceng kuijian youxuan ne? Haishi ta ceng yu zhiren zhu ding yue ne
Buran, wo jiang jilu tasuo shuo de, wo jiang wei ta jiazhong xingfa
wo jiang jicheng tasuo shuo de caichan he zisi. Er ta jiang zhishen lai jian wo
Tamen she an la er chongbai xuduo zhuzai, zuowei ziji de quanli
Buran, naxie zhuzai jiang fouren tamen de chongbai, er bian cheng tamen de choudi
Ni hai bu zhidao ma? Wo ba emomen fang chuqu youhuo bu xindao zhe
suoyi ni dui tamen buyao jizao, wo zhi shu tamen de shou shu
Na ri, wo yao ba jingwei zhe jihe dao zhiren de zhu na li, xiangshou en rong
Wo yao ba fanzui zhe quzhu dao huo yu qu, yi feishui jieke
Dan yu zhiren zhu ding yue zhe chuwai, renmen bude shuo qing
Tamen shuo:“Zhiren zhu shouyang erzi.”
Nimen que yi fanle yi jian zhongda zuixing.(Weile na jian zuixing)
tian jihu yao po, de jihu yao lie, shan jihu yao beng
Zhe shi yinwei tamen wangcheng zhiren zhu you erzi
Zhiren zhu bu hui shouyang erzi
fan zai tiandi jian de, jianglai meiyou yige bu xiang nupu yiyang guiyi zhiren zhu de
Ta que yi tongjiguo tamen, jiandianguo tamen
Fuhuo ri tamen dou yao zhishen lai jian ta
Xindao erqie xingshan zhe, zhiren zhu biding yao shi tamen xiangqin xiang'ai
Wo yi ni de yuyan, shi “gulanjing” chengwei rongyi de, zhi wei yao ni jie ta xiang jingwei zhe baoxi, bing jinggao qiangbian de minzhong
Zai tamen zhiqian, wo ceng huimiele xuduo shidai, ni neng faxian naxie shidai zhong de renhe ren, huo tingjian tamen suo fachu de wei sheng ma
Ta ha
Wo jiang “gulanjing” gei ni, bu wei shi ni xinku
que wei jiaohui jingwei zhe
shi jiang zi chuangzao dadi he cangqiong zhe de
Zhiren zhu yi sheng shang baozuole
Fan zai tianshang dixia de, zai tiandi zhi jian de, zai di dixia de, dou shi ta de
Ruguo ni gao sheng shuohua, namo an la dique zhidao mimi de he geng yin wei de shiqing
Chu an la wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai zhe, ta you xuduo zuimei de ming hao
Ni yi ting dao mu sa de gushile ma

Dangshi, ta kanjian yi chu huoguang, jiu dui ta de jiashu shuo:“Nimen shao liu yixia, wo que yi kanjian yi chu huole, yexu wo na yige huoba lai gei nimen, huoxu wo zai you huo di na li faxian xiangdao.”
Ta lai dao nage huo de fujin, jiu you shengyin hanjiao shuo:“Mu sa a
Wo que shi ni de zhu, ni tuo diao ni de xiezi ba, ni que shi zai sheng gu ‘du wa’ zhong
Wo yi tiaoxuan ni, ni yingdang qingting qishi
Wo que shi an la, chu wo wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai zhe. Ni yingdang chongbai wo, dang wei jinian wo er jin shou bai gong
Fuhuo shi, que shi yao lailin de, wo jihu yao yincang ta, yibian mei ge ren dou yin ziji de xingwei er shou baochou
Bu xin fuhuo shi'er shuncong siyu zhe, buyao rang ta zuzhi ni xinyang fuhuo shi, yizhi ni miewang
Mu sa a! Zai ni youshou li de shi shenme?”
Ta shuo:“Zhe shi wo de shouzhang, wo zhuzhe ta, wo yong ta ba shuye jiluo xialai gei wo de yang chi, wo duiyu ta hai you bie de xuduo xuyao.”
Zhu shuo:“Mu sa a! Ni ba ta reng xia.”
Ta jiu ba ta reng xiale, ta huran bian chengle yitiao wan yan de she
Zhu shuo:“Ni zhuo zhu ta, buyao pa, wo jiang shi ta huanyuan.”
“Ni bashou fang zai huai li, ranhou chou chulai, shou bian cheng xuebai de, danshi meiyou she me jibing, na shi ling yi zhong jixiang
Wo zhishi ni wo de zuida jixiang
Ni qu jian falao, ta que shi baonue wu dao de.”
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni shi wo de xinqing shuchang
qiu ni shi wo de shiye shunli
qiu ni jiechu wo de kouchi
yibian tamen liaojie wo dehua
Qiu ni cong wo de jiashu zhong wei wo renming yige zhushou
wo di gege ha lun
rang ta xiangzhu wo
shi ta yu wo tongshi
yibian women duo zansong ni
duo jinian ni
Ni que shi mingcha women de
Zhu shuo:“Mu sa a! Ni suo qingqiu de shi, yi shangci nile.”
Zai bie de shihou, wo ceng zhaogu ni
Dangshi, wo gei ni muqin yi ying you de qishi

shuo:“Ni ba ta fang zai yige xiangzi li, ranhou ba nage xiangzi fang zai he li, heshui yao ba ta piao dao an bian, er wo de yige diren——yeshi ta de diren——jiang shouyang ta.” Wo ba cong wo fachu de ci'ai shangci ni, yibian ni zai wo de qinyan jianhu zhi xia shou fuyu

Dangshi, ni de jiejie zou qu shuo:“Wo zhishi nimen yige yangyu ta de ren, hao ma?” Wo jiu ba ni song hai ni muqin, yibian ta yukuai er bu youchou. Ni ceng shale yige ren, er wo zhengjiu ni tuoli youhuan, wo ceng yi xuduo zhemo kaoyan ni. Ni ceng zai mai de yan ren zhi jian douliule xuduo nian. Mu sa a! Ranhou, ni yi qian ding er lai dao zheli
Wo wei ziji er tiaoxuan ni
Ni he ni di gege, daizhe wo de xuduo jixiang qu ba! Ni lia duiyu jinian wo jue buke daiman
Ni lia dao falao nali qu, ta que shi baonue wu dao de
Ni lia dui ta shuohua yao wenhe, huoxu ta hui jiqu jiaohui, huozhe you suo weiju
Ta lia shuo:“Women de zhu a! Women dique pa ta cubao de shanghai women, huo gengjia baonue wu dao.”
Zhu shuo:“Ni lia buyao pa, wo dique tong ni lia zai yiqi, wo tingzhe, erqie kanzhe

Ni lia qu ta nali shuo:‘Wo lia que shi ni de zhu de shizhe, suoyi qing ni rang yiselie de houyi tong wo lia yidao qu, qing ni buyao nuedai tamen. Women yijing ba ni de zhu de yi zhong jixiang dai lai gei nile; zunshou zhengdao zhe, de xiang heping
Women que yi feng dao qishi shuo: Fouren erqie beiqi zhe, jiang shou xingfa.’”
Ta shuo:“Mu sa a! Shei shi ni lia de zhu?”
Ta shuo:“Women de zhu, shi ba tianxing fuyu wanwu, er jiayi yindao de.”
Ta shuo:“Yiwang ge shiji de qingkuang shi zenyang de?”
Ta shuo:“Guanyu tamen de zhishi, zai wo de zhu nali jilu zai yi ben shu zhong. Wo de zhu, ji bu cuowu, you bu shuhu.”
Ta wei nimen yi dadi wei yaolan, ta wei nimen zai dadishang kaipi xuduo daolu, ta cong tianshang jiangxia yushui, er jie yushui shengchan ge zhong zhiwu
Nimen keyi chi naxie zhiwu, keyi fangmu nimen de shengchu. Duiyu you lizhi zhe, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang
Wo cong dadi chuangzaole nimen, wo shi nimen fu fan yu dadi, wo zai yici shi nimen cong da di fuhuo
Wo que yi zhishi ta wo suoyou de yi qie jixiang, er ta jiayi fouren, bu ken xindao
Ta shuo:“Mu sa a! Ni dao women zheli lai, xiang jie ni de moshu ba women zhu chu guojing ma
Women biding zai ni mianqian biaoyan tongyang de moshu. Ni zai yige huxiang shangliang di difang, zai women he ni zhi jian, ding yige yue qi, women he ni, dajia dou bu shuangyue.”
Ta shuo: Nimen de yue qi ding zai jieri, dang zhongren zai zaochen jihe de shihou
Falao jiu zhuan huiqu, zhaoji ta de mouchen, ranhou ta laile
Mu sa dui tamen shuo:“Nimen zhen gaisi, nimen buyao wumie an la, yimian ta yong xingfa huimie nimen; wumie an la zhe, que yi shibaile.”
Tamen wei zhe jian shi, yilun fenfen, bingqie yinni tamen de yilun
tamen shuo:“Zhe liang ge que shi liang ge shushi, xiang yong moshu ba nimen zhu chu guojing, bingqie feichu nimen de zui wanshan de zhidu
suoyi, nimen yingdang jueding nimen de jice, ranhou jie dui er lai; jintian zhan shangfeng de, biding chenggong.”
Tamen shuo:“Mu sa a! Shi ni xian pao ni de jiahuo ne? Haishi women xian pao ne?”
Ta shuo:“Haishi nimen xian pao ba!” Tamen de shengzi he guaizhang, zai ta kan lai, haoxiang shi yin tamen de moshu er wan yan de
Mu sa jiu xinhuai weiju
Wo shuo:“Ni buyao pa, ni que shi zhan youshi de
Ni pao xia ni youshou li de guaizhang, ta jiu hui tunmole tamen suo zaozuo de. Tamen suo zaozuo de, zhishi shushi di fashu; shushimen wulun gan shenme zong shi bu chenggong de.”
Yushi, shushimen baidao xiaqu, tamen shuo:“Women yi gui xin ha lun he mu sa de zhule.”

Falao shuo:“Zai wo yunxu nimen zhiqian, nimen jiu xinfeng tale ma? Ta biding shi nimen de touzi, ta ba moshu chuanshou gei nimen, suoyi wo shi bi jiaohuzhe kan diao nimen de shou he jiao, wo shi bi ba nimen ding si zai ye zao shu shang, nimen biding zhidao wo lia shei de xingfa geng yanli, geng changjiu.”
Tamen shuo:“Women jue bu yuan tiaoxuan ni er paoqi yi jianglin women de mingzheng he chuangzao women de zhuzai. Ni yao zenme ban jiu zenme ban ba! Ni zhi neng zai jinshi shenghuo zhong renyi er wei
Women que yi xinyang women de zhu, yibian ta shemian women de guoshi, he zai ni de qiangpo xia women biaoyan moshu de zuixing. An la (de shangci) shi geng hao de,(ta de xingfa) shi geng jiu de.”
Fanzui er lai jian zhu zhe, bi ru huo yu, ta zai qizhong busi ye bu huo
Xindao heng shan er lai jian wo zhe, de xiang zuigao de pinji
——changzhu de leyuan, xia lin zhu he, er yong ju qizhong. Na shi chunjie zhe de baochou
Wo que yi qishi mu sa shuo:“Ni zai yejian shuailingzhe wo de pu renmen qu luxing, ni wei tamen zai haishang kaipi yitiao han dao, ni buyao pa zhui bing chu, ye buyao pa yan si.”
Falao tongling ta de jundui, gan shang tamen, sui wei haishui suo yanmo
Falao ba ta de baixing ling ru qitu, ta wei jiang tamen yinru zhengdao
Yiselie de houyi a! Wo ceng zhengjiu nimen tuoli nimen de diren, wo ceng zai na shan de youbian yu nimen ding yue, wo ceng jiang ganlu he anchun gei nimen
Nimen keyi chi wo suo shangci nimen de jiamei de shipin, dan buke guofen, yimian ying shou wo de qianze, shei ying shou wo de qianze, shei bi lunsang
Huizui xindao, bingqie li xingshan gong, yong xun zhengdao zhe, wo duiyu ta, que shi zhi she de
Mu sa a! Ni weihe cangcu de likai ni de zongzu ne
Ta shuo:“Tamen jiang zhuizong er lai. Wo de zhu a! Wo mang dao ni zheli lai, yibian ni xiyue.”
Zhu shuo: Zai ni (libie) yihou, wo que yi kaoyan ni de zongzu, sa mi li yi shi tamen mi wule

Mu sa beifen di zhuan huiqu kan ta de zongzu, ta shuo:“Wo de zongzu a! Nandao nimen de zhu, meiyou gei nimen yige meihao de yingxu ma? Nimen juede shijian tai zhang ne? Haishi nimen xiang ying shou cong nimen de zhu fachu de qianze, yin'er nimen weibeile dui wo de yue yan ne?”

Tamen shuo:“Women meiyou ziyuan de weibei dui ni de yue yan, dan women ba xuduo shoushi xiedai chulai, juede hen chenzhong, women jiu pao xiale naxie shoushi, sa mi li ye tongyang pao xiale (ta de shoushi).”
Ta jiu wei tamen zhu chu yitou niudu——yige you du sheng de quke, tamen jiu shuo:“Zhe shi nimen de zhu, yeshi mu sa de zhu, dan ta wangjile.”
Na tou niudu buneng huida tamen de wen hua, ye buneng zhuchi tamen de huo fu, nandao tamen bu zhidao ma
Yiqian ha lun que yi dui tamen shuo:“Wo de zongzu a! Nimen zhishi bei niudu suo mihuo, nimen de zhu, que shi zhiren zhu. Nimen yingdang shuncong wo, dang fucong wo de mingling.”
Tamen shuo:“Women bi jixu chongbai niudu, zhidao mu sa zhuan huilai.”
Mu sa shuo: Ha lun a! Dang ni kanjian tamen wu ru mitu de shihou, shi shenme zhang'ai
ni weihe bu gensui wo? Nandao ni yao weibei wo de mingling ma?”
Ta shuo:“Wo de bao di a! Ni buyao jiu zhu wo de toufa he huzi, wo dique pa ni shuo:‘Ni shi yiselie fenlie, er bu zhuyi wo dehua’.”
Mu sa shuo:“Sa mi li a! Ni zenmeliao?”
Ta shuo:“Wo ceng jian tamen suo wei jian de, wo cong shizhe de yiji shang wole yi ba tu, er wo ba ta pao xiaqu, wo de siyu nayang songyong wo.”

Ta shuo:“Ni qu ba! Ni zhe beizi biding chang shuo: Buyao jiechu wo. Ni que you yige (shouxing de) yue qi, ni jue buneng taobi ta, ni kan ni qiancheng zhu shou de shenling ba! Women biding yao fenhua ta, ranhou bi ba ta sa zai haili
Nimen suo dang chongbai de, zhishi an la, chu ta wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai de, ta shi zhouzhi wanwu de.”
Wo zheyang dui ni xushu yiwang zhe de gushi, wo yi ci gei ni cong wo fachu de jinian
shei weibei zhege jinian, shei zai fuhuo ri bi fuzhong zui
er yong ju qi xingfa zhong. Fuhuo ri na fudan dui tamen zhen zaogao
Na shi zai chui haojiao zhi ri, zai na ri wo jiang jihe lan yanjing de zuifan
tamen di sheng xiang gao shuo: Nimen zhi douliule shi tian
Wo zhidao tamen shuo xie shenme. Dangshi, tamen zhong sixiang zui zhengque de ren shuo: Nimen zhi douliule yitian
Tamen wen ni zhu shan de (jieju), ni shuo: Wo de zhujiang fensui zhu shan
er shi tamen bian cheng pingyuan
ni jiang buneng jian shenme kanke, ye buneng jian shenme qiqu.”
Zai na ri, zhongren jiang shuncong haozhao zhe, hao wu wei'ao, yiqie shengyin jiang wei zhiren zhu er anjing xialai, chu zu sheng wai, ni ting bujian renhe shengyin
Zai na ri, chu zhiren zhu suo texu erqie xi'ai qi yanlun zhe wai, yiqie shuo qing, dou meiyou gongxiao
Zai tamen qianmian de he zai tamen houmian de, an la dou zhidao, er tamen que bu zhidao
Zui renmen jiang dui yongsheng zili de zhuzai biaoshi qiangong, beifu zui'e zhe, que yi shiwangle
Xindao erqie xingshan zhe, bupa kui wang he kekou
Wo zheyang jiang shi alabo wen de “gulanjing”, wo zai qizhong shenshu jinggao, yibian tamen jingwei, huo shi tamen jiyi
An la shi chaojue wanwu, zai zhi zhongsheng, ti yong zhenshi de. Dui ni qishi “gulanjing” hai meiyou wanquan de shihou, ni buyao jimang songdu. Ni shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni zengjia wo de zhishi.”
Yiqian, wo que yi zhufu a dan, er ta wangji wo de zhufu, wo wei faxian ta you renhe juexin
Dangshi wo dui zhong tianshi shuo:“Nimen dang xiang a dan koutou.” Tamen jiu koutou, dan yi bo lie si chuwai, ta jujue koutou
Wo shuo:“A dan a! Zhe que shi ni de choudi, ye que shi ni de qizi de choudi, jue buyao rang ta ba ni lia zhu chu leyuan, yimian nimen xinku
Ni zai leyuan li bi bu ji'e, bi bu luolu
bi bu kou ke, bi bugan yanre.”
Sihou, emo youhuo ta shuo:“A dan a! Wo zhishi ni changsheng shu, he buxiu yuan hao ma?”
Ta lia jiu chile na ke shu de guoshi, ta lia de yinbu jiu dui ta lia xianlule, ta lia jiu yi yuan li de shuye zhebi shenti. A dan weibeile ta de zhu, yin'er mi wule
Sihou, ta de zhu tiaoxuanle ta, raoshule ta, yindaole ta
Ta shuo:“Ni lia dou cong leyuan jiang xiaqu! Nimen jiang huxiang choushi. Ruguo zhengdao cong wo jianglin nimen, namo, shei zunxun wo de zhengdao, shei bu hui mi wu, ye bu hui daomei
shei weibei wo de jiaohui, shei biguo jiongpo de shenghuo, fuhuo ri, wo shi ta zai mangmu di qingkuang xia bei jihe.”
Ta jiang shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Wo benlai bu shi mangmu di, ni weisheme shi wo zai mangmu di qingkuang xia bei jihe ne?”
Zhujiang shuo:“Shishi shi zheyang de, wo de jixiang jianglin ni, er ni yiqi ta, ni jintian ye tongyang di bei yiqile.”
Fan xingwei guofen erqie buxin zhu de jixiang zhe, wo du yao gei ta tongyang de baochou. Houshi de xingfa, que shi geng yanli de, que shi geng chang cun de
Nandao tamen bu zhidao ma? Zai tamen zhiqian, wo ceng huimiele xuduo shidai, tamen chang he naxie ren de guxiang wanglai, duiyu you lizhi zhe, ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang
Yao bushi you yiju hua cong ni de zhu yuxian fachu, yao bushi you qixian, ni de zhu jiayi yuding, name,(huimie duiyu tamen) shi biran de
Ni yingdang renshou tamen suo shuo de (lanyan), ni yingdang zai taiyang chumo zhiqian zansong ni de zhu, ni yingdang zai yejian he baizhou zansong ta, yibian ni xiyue
Ni buyao jiyu wo suoyong yi gongji tamen zhong ge deng ren xiangshou de, na shi jinshi shenghuo de fuhua, wo yong lai kaoyan tamen; ni de zhu de jiyang, shi geng hao de, shi geng jiu de
Ni yingdang mingling ni de xintumen libai, ni duiyu bai gong, ye yingdang youheng, wo bu yi jiyang zecheng ni, wo gongji ni, shan guo zhi guiyu jingwei zhe
Tamen shuo:“Ta zenme bu cong ta de zhu nali na lai yi zhong jixiang gei women ne?” Zuowei qian dai jingdian mingzheng de “gulanjing”, nandao meiyou jianglin tamen ma

Jiaruo zai paiqian ta zhiqian, wo yi xingfa huimie tamen, tamen biding yao shuo:“Women de zhu a! Ni zenme bu paiqian yige shizhe lai yindao women, yibian women zai mengshou beijian he chiru zhiqian, zunshou ni de jixiang ne?”
Ni shuo:“Women shuangfang dou shi denghou de, nimen dengzhe ba, nimen jianglai jiu zhidao shei shi lu tantu de, shei shi xun zhengdao de.”
Dui zhongren de qingsuan yijing linjinle, tamen que zai shuhu zhi zhong, bu jiayi siwei
Mei feng you xin de jinian, cong tamen de zhu jianglin tamen, tamen qingting ta, bing jiayi chaoxiao
Tamen shi xinbuzaiyan de. Bu yi zhe mimi tanlun shuo:“Zhe zhishi yige xiang nimen yiyang de fanren, nimen mingzhi shi moshu er shuncong ta ma?”
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu zhidao zai tianshang he dishang suo shuo dehua, ta que shi quan cong de, que shi quanzhi de.”
Dan tamen shuo: Zhe shi chirenshuomeng ne? Haishi ta niezao huangyan ne? Haishi ta shi yige shiren ne? Jiao ta xiang gudai de zhong shizhe nayang zhaoshi women yi zhong jixiang ba
Zai tamen zhiqian, wo suo huimie de chengshi, meiyou yige ceng xin jixiang de. Xianzai, tamen hui xin jixiang ma
Zai ni zhiqian, wo zhi paiqianle ceng feng qishi de xuduo nanren; ruguo nimen bu zhidao, jiu yingdang xunwen jingtong jinian zhe
Wo meiyou ba tamen zaocheng bu chifan de roushen, tamen ye bushi changsheng bulao de
Sihou, wo dui tamen shijian nuo yue, gu zhengjiu tamen he wo suo yiyu zhe, er huimieleguo fen zhe
Wo que yi jiang shi nimen yi ben jingdian, qizhong you nimen de jinian, nandao nimen bu liaojie ma
Wo ceng huimiele xuduo bu yi de xiangcun, suihou, wo ceng chuangzaole bie de minzhong
Dang tamen ganjue wo de yanxing de shihou, tamen huran benpao
“Nimen buyao benpao, nimen huiqu xiangshou nimen de haohua shenghuo, he nimen de zhuzhai, yibian nimen jianglai shou shenxun.”
Tamen shuo:“Ai zai women! Women yuanlai que shi bu yi de ren.”
Na ju hua, jiangyao chang wei tamen de aihao, zhidao wo shi tamen bian cheng gu cha he sihui
Wo weiceng yi youxi de taidu chuangzao tiandi wanwu
jiaruo wo yao xiaoqian, wo biding yi wo zheli de dongxi zuo xiaoqian, wo bushi ai xiaoqian de
Wo yi zhenli touzhi miu wang, er jipo qi naodai, miu wang shunshi xiaowang. Bei zai nimen! Youyu nimen dui an la wang jia miaoshu
Fan zai tiandi jian de, dou shi ta de; fan zai ta nali de, dou qiancheng de chongbai ta, ji bu aoman, you bu pijuan
Tamen zhouye zan ta chaojue, hao bu songxie
Nandao tamen ba dadishang de xuduo dongxi dang shenming, er naxie shenming neng shi siren fuhuo ma
Chu an la wai, jiaruo tiandi jian hai you xuduo shenming, name, tiandi biding pohuaile. Zansong an la——baozuo de zhu——shi chao hu tamen de miaoshu de
Ta ziji de xingwei, bu shou shenxun, er tamen dou shi yao shou shenxun de

Nandao tamen chu an la wai hai shi feng xuduo shenming ma? Ni shuo:“Nimen na zhengju lai ba, zhe shi duiyu wo de tongdao zhe de jinian, yeshi duiyu zai wo zhiqian zhe de jinian, dan tamen daban buzhi zhenli, beiqi ta.”
Zai ni zhiqian, wo suo paiqian de shizhe, dou feng dao wo de qishi: Chu wo zhi wai jue wu ying shou chongbai de. Suoyi nimen yingdang chongbai wo
Tamen shuo:“Zhiren zhu yi (tianshi) wei nu'er.” Zansong an la, chaojue wanwu. Buran, tamen shi shou youdai de nupu
tamen zai ta nali bu gan xian kaikou, tamen zhi fengxing ta de mingling
ta zhidao zai tamen qianmian de he houmian de; tamen zhi ti tasuo xiyue zhe shuo qing. Tamen yin jingwei ta er kongju
Tamen zhong shei shuo:“Wo shi an la yiwai de shenming,” wo jiu yi huo yu baochou shei, wo jiangyao zheyang baochou yiqie bu yi zhe
Buxindao zhe nandao bu zhidao ma? Tiandi yuan shi bise de, er wo kaitianpidi, wo yongshui chuangzao yiqie shengwu. Nandao tamen buxin ma
Wo zai da dishang chuangzaole qun shan, yimian da di dongdang er tamen bu'an; wo zai qun shan jian chuangzao xuduo kuankuo de daolu, yibian tamen neng dadao mudi
Wo ba tian zaocheng anquan de qionglong, er tamen hushi qizhong de jixiang
Ta shi chuangzao zhouye he ri yue de, tianti yun hang ge xun yitiao guidao
Zai ni zhiqian de renhe ren, wo meiyou wei ta zhuding changsheng, ruguo ni sile, nandao tamen nenggou changsheng ma
Fan you xueqi zhe, dou yao chang si de ziwei. Wo yi huo fu kaoyan nimen, nimen zhi bei zhao gui wo
Dang bu xindao zhe kanjian ni de shihou, tamen zhi ba ni dang zuo xiaobing.(Tamen shuo):“Jiushi zhege ren feibang nimen de shenming ma?” Tamen bu xin zhiren zhu de jinian
Ren shi shenglai jizao de, wo jiangyao zhaoshi nimen wo de jixiang, suoyi nimen bubi cuicu wo
Tamen shuo:“Zhege jinggao jiang zai he shi shixian ne? Ruguo nimen shi chengshi de ren.”
Jiaruo bu xindao zhe, zhidao zai nage shihou, tamen buneng dui ziji de mianbu he beibu fangyu huoyan, tamen ye buneng huode yuanzhu……
dan fuhuo shi jiang turan lailin, er shi tamen jinghuang shicuo, tamen buneng dikang ta, ye bu meng zhan huan
Zai ni zhiqian, you xuduo shizhe, que yi bei ren yunong, er yunong de xingfa yi jianglin yunong zhele
Ni shuo:“Shei zai zhouye zhong baohu nimen, shi nimen de mian yu zhiren zhu (de xingfa) ne?” Buran, tamen beiqi tamen de zhu de jinian
Chu wo zhi wai, nandao tamen you xuduo shenming baohu tamen ma? Tamen suo chongbai de shenming, buneng ziwei, tamen dui wo (de xingfa) ye bu meng bihu
Buran, wo shi zhe deng ren he tamen de zuxian de xiangshou anle, zhidao tamen de shouming yanchang. Nandao tamen bu zhidao wo lai suoxiao tamen de bianjing ma? Nandao tamen shi zhansheng zhe ma
Ni shuo:“Wo zhi jie qishi er jinggao nimen.” Dang longzi bei jinggao de shihou, tamen ting bujian zhaohuan
Ruguo ni de zhu de xingfa, youyi sihao jiechu tamen, tamen biding shuo:“Bei zai women! Women yuanlai que shi bu yi zhe.”
Zai fuhuo ri, wo jiang shezhi gongdao de tiancheng, renhe ren dou bu shou yidian er yuanwang; ta de xingwei sui wei ru jiezi, wo ye yao baochou ta; wo zu wei qingsuan zhe
Wo que yi shangci mu sa he ha lun zhengju he guangming, yiji jingwei zhe de jinian
jingwei zhe zai mimi zhong jingwei tamen de zhu, tamen shi wei fuhuo shi'er kongju de
Zhe shi wo suo jiang shi de jixiang de jinian, nandao nimen fouren ta ma
Yiqian wo que yi ba zhengzhi shangci yi bo la xin, wo yuan shi shen zhi ta de
Dangshi, ta dui ta de fuqin he zongzu shuo:“Nimen suo yilian de zhexie diaoxiang shi shenme dongxi?”
Tamen shuo:“Women faxian women de zuxian shi chongbai tamen de.”
Ta shuo:“Nimen he nimen de zuxian, que yi xianyu mingxian de mi wu zhi zhong.”
Tamen shuo: Ni shi dui women shuo zhengjing hua ne? Haishi he women kaiwanxiao ne
Ta shuo:“Buran, nimen de zhu, shi tiandi de zhu, shi tiandi de chuangzao zhe, wo duiyu ci shi shi yige zhengren
Zhi an la fashi, nimen zhuanshen likai zhihou, wo bi shefa hui diao nimen de ouxiang.”
Ta ba ouxiang da suile, zhi liu xia yige zuida de, yibian tamen zhuan huilai wen ta
Tamen shuo:“Shei dui women de shenling zuole zhe jian shi ne? Ta que shi bu yi de ren.”
Tamen shuo: Women ceng tingjian yige qingnian, ming jiao yi bo la xin de, feibang tamen
Tamen shuo:“Nimen ba ta na dao zhongren mianqian, yibian tamen zuozheng.”
Tamen shuo: Yi bo la xin a! Ni dui women de shenling zuole zhe jian shi ma
Ta shuo:“Buran, shi zhege zuida de ouxiang zuole zhe jian shi. Ruguo tamen hui shuohua, nimen jiu wen wen tamen ba.”
Tamen jiu huxiang piping. Suihou shuo:“Nimen (chongbai ouxiang) que shi bu yi de.”
Ranhou, tamen daoxingnishi,(tamen shuo):“Ni que yi zhidao zhexie shi bu hui shuohua de.”
Ta shuo: Nimen she an la er chongbai naxie dui nimen hao wu huo fu de dongxi ma
Pei, nimen bu chongbai an la, que chongbai zhexie dongxi, nandao nimen bu lijie ma?”
Tamen shuo:“Nimen shao si ta ba! Nimen yuanzhu nimen de shenling ba! Ruguo nimen you suo zuowei.”
Wo shuo:“Huo a! Ni dui yi bo la xin bian cheng liangshuang de heping de ba!”
Tamen xiang mouhai ta, dan wo shi tamen bian cheng zui kuisun de
Wo zhengjiu ta he lu te, er shi ta lia qianyi dao wo wei shiren er jiang fu di difang qu
Wo shangci ta yi si ha ge, you zeng ci ta ye er gu bai, wo shi tamen dou bian cheng shanren
Wo yi tamen wei shiren de shibiao, tamen feng wo de mingling er yindao zhongren. Wo qishi tamen: Yingdang lixingshanshi, jin shou bai gong, wan na tian ke. Tamen shi zhi chongbai wo de
Wo shangci lu te zhihui he xueshi, wo zhengjiu ta tuoli you hui xing de chengshi, nage chengshi de jumin que shi fangdang de e min
Wo shi ta jinru wo de enhui zhi zhong, ta que shi yige shanren
(Ni yingdang xushu) nu ha, yiqian, ta ceng huyu wo, guwo dayingle ta, bingqie zhengjiu ta he ta de xintumen tuoli youhuan
Wo shi ta tuoli fouren wo de jixiang de minzhong, tamen que shi e min, guwo shi tamen tongtong bei yan si
(Ni yingdang xushu) da wu de he su lai man, dang baixing de yang qun yejian chulai chi zhuangjia de shihou, ta lia wei zhuangjia er panjue, duiyu tamen de panjue wo shi jianzheng
Wo shi su lai man zhidao zenyang panjue. Mei yige wo du shangcile zhihui he xueshi. Wo shi qun shan he zhong niao suicong da wu de yidao zansong wo. Wo cengjing zuoguo na jian shile
Wo jiao ta ti nimen zhizao kaijia, yi baohu nimen, shi nimen de mian yu zhanzheng de chuangshang, zhe nimen ganxie ma
Wo ti su lai man zhifu kuangfeng, ta feng ta de mingling er chui dao wo ceng jiang fu di difang, wo shi shen zhi wanwu de
Wo you ti ta zhifu yibufen emo, tamen ti ta qianshui, bingqie zuo qita gongzuo, wo shi jiandu tamen de
(Ni yingdang xushu) ai you bo, dangshi ta ceng huyu ta de zhu, shuo:“Guji que yi shanghai wo, ni shi zui renci de.”
Wo jiu daying ta de qingqiu, er jiechu tasuo huan de guji, bing yi ta de jiashu he tongyang de ren shangci ta, zhe shi youyu cong wo fachu de enhui he duiyu chongbai wo zhe de jinian
(Ni yingdang xushu) yi sima yi, yi de li si, zhu lei ji fu lei dou shi jianren de
Wo shi tamen jinru wo de enhui zhi zhong, tamen que shi shanren

(Ni yingdang xushu) zuo nong, dangshi ta ceng fenfen bu pingdi li qu, ta caixiang wo jue bu yueshu ta, ta zai chongchong hei'an zhong huyu (shuo):“Chu ni zhi wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai zhe, wo zansong ni chaojue wanwu, wo que shi bu yi de.”
Wo jiu daying ta, er zhengjiu ta tuoli youhuan; wo zheyang zhengjiu xindao zhe tuoli youhuan
(Ni yingdang xushu) zai kai li ya, dangshi ta ceng huyu ta de zhu (shuo):“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni buyao ren sui wo gudu, ni shi zui hao de jicheng zhe.”
Wo jiu daying ta, erqie shangci ta ye ha ya, bing gaizheng ta de qizi. Tamen zhengxian xingshan, tamen yin xiwang he kongju er huyu wo, tamen duiyu wo shi gongshun de
(Ni yingdang xushu) na baochi zhencao de nuzi, wo ba wo de jingshen chui ru ta de tinei, wo ceng yi ta he ta de erzi wei shiren de yi zhong jixiang
Nimen de zhege minzu, que shi yige tongyi de minzu, wo shi nimen de zhu, gu nimen yingdang chongbai wo
Tamen fen cheng liao ruogan jiaopai, ge pai dou yao guiyu wo
Shei xindao erqie xing shan, shei de laoji jue bu zao fouren, wo que shi jilu ta de shangong de
Wo suo huimie de shi zhen, xiang fu fan renshi, na shi bu keneng de
Zhidao ya zhu zhe he ma zhu zhe bei kaishi, er cong ge gaodi liu xiang sifang
Zhenshi de yingxu jiangjinle, bu xindao zhe turan deng zhuo yanjing (shuo):“Bei zai women! Women duiyu jintian ceng shi shuhu de. Buran, women shi bu yi de.”
Nimen he nimen she an la er chongbai de, que shi huo yu de ranliao, nimen jiang jinru huo yu
Jiaruo zhexie shi shenling, tamen bu jinru huo yule. Tamen dou jiang yong ju qizhong
Tamen zai qizhong jiang jingchang tanxi, tamen zai qizhong jiang yi wu suo wen
Ceng meng wo zui you de daiyu zhe, jiang yuanli huo yu
er bu wen qi zui wei de shengyin, tamen jiang yong ju zai ziji suo aihao de xiangle zhong
bu shi tamen youchou zuida de kongbu. Zhong tianshi jiang huanying tamen (shuo):“Zhe shi nimen ceng shou yingxu de rizi.”
Zai na ri, wo jiang tian juan qi youru juanzhou jiang shuhua juan qi yiyang. Qichu wo zenyang chuangzao wanwu, wo jiu zenyang shi wanwu huanyuan. Zhe shi wo ziyuan yingxu de, wo bi shixing ta
Zai jinian de jingdian yihou, wo que yi zai “zai fu er” zhong xie dao: Dadi bi wei wo de shan pu suo jicheng
Duiyu chongbai zhu de minzhong, ci jing zhong que you chongzu de biyi
Wo paiqian ni, zhi wei lianmin zhong shijie
Ni shuo:“Wo zhi feng dao qishi shuo: Nimen suo dang chongbai de, zhishi du yi de zhuzai. Nimen guishun ma?”
Ruguo tamen beili zhengdao, ni jiu shuo:“Wo gongping di tongzhi nimen, wo bu zhidao nimen suo bei jinggao (de xingfa) shi linjin de ne? Haishi yaoyuan de ne
Ta dique zhidao gongkai de yanyu, ye zhidao nimen suo yinhui de
Wo bu zhidao, zhe huoxu shi dui nimen de kaoyan he zhanshi de xiangshou.”
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni binggong panjue. Women de zhu shi zhiren de zhu, duiyu nimen suoyong yi miaoshu ta de yanyu ta shi bei qiuzhu de.”
Zhongren a! Nimen yingdang jingwei nimen de zhu, fuhuo shi di dizhen, que shi yi jian dashi

Zai na ri, nimen kanjian dizhen xia mei ge rumu dou bei xia de wangjile ying'er, xia de mei ge yunfu dou yao liuchan; ni ba renmen kan cheng shi zui han, qishi tamen bingfei shi zui han, er shi yin wei an la de xingfa shi yanjun de
Youren wuzhi di jinxing guanyu an la de zhenglun, bingqie shuncong panni de emo
Fan jiejiao emo zhe, emo biding shi ta mi wu, biding ba ta yinru huo yu de xingfa, zhe shi gei zhudingle de

Zhongren a! Ruguo nimen duiyu fuhuo de shi hai zai huaiyi zhi zhong, name, wo que yi chuangzaole nimen, xian yong nitu, ji yong yi xiao di jingye, ji yong yikuai ningxie, ji yong wanzheng de he bu wanzheng de rou tuan, yibian wo dui nimen chanming (daoli). Wo shi wo suo yu de (tai'er) zai zigong li anju yige dingqi, ranhou, wo shi nimen chusheng wei ying'er, ranhou (wo rang nimen huozhe), yibian nimen dadao chengnian. Nimen zhong you yaozhe de; you fu fan yu zui lie de nianji de, yibian ta zai you zhishi zhihou, shenme ye bu zhidao. Ni kan dadi shi bumao de, dang wo shi yushui jiang yu dadi de shihou, ta jiu huodong he pengzhang, erqie shengchu ge zhong meili de zhiwu
Zhe shi yin wei an la shi zhen zai, ta neng shi sizhe fusheng, ta duiyu wanshi shi quanneng
Fuhuo que shi yao lailin de, hao wuyi yi. An la yao shi fenmu li de ren fuhuo qilai
Youren zhenglun an la, dan ta ji wu zhishi, you wu zhidao, qie wu canlan de jingdian
Ta aoman de zou kai, yibian you ren panli an la de dadao. Ta zai jinshi yao shou lingru, fuhuo ri wo yao ta changshi shaozhuo de xingfa
Zhe shi yinwei ni suo fan de zuixing, ye yin wei an la jue bushi kuidai zhong puren de
Youren zai bianyuan shang chongbai an la, ruo huo fuli, ta jiu anran xiangshou; ruo zao huohai, ta jiu qingshuai beipan. Ta jiang sangshi jinshi he houshi, zhe shi mingxian de kuisun
Ta she an la er qidao na duiyu ta ji wu huo you wu fu de dongxi, zhe shi bu jin qingli de mi wu
Ta qidao na you jin huo er wu yuan fu de dongxi, ta de yuanzhu zhe zhen elie! Zuo ta de tongban de zhen elie
An la biding yao shi xindao erqie xingshan zhe jinru na xia lin zhu he de leyuan. An la jiu zheyang zuo tasuo yu yi zhi shi
Shei caixiang an la zai jinshi he houshi jue bu xiangzhu ta, jiao shei xuanliang zijin, jiao ta kan ta de jice neng fou jiechu ta de fennu
Wo zheyang jiang shi “gulanjing”, zuowei mingxian de jixiang, an la que shi yindao tasuo yu yindao de
Xindao zhe, youtai jiaotu, sa bi an ren, jidu jiaotu, baihuojiao tu, yiji yi wu pei zhu zhe, fuhuo ri an la biding yao wei tamen panjue, an la que shi wanwu de jianzheng zhe

Ni nandao bu zhidao ma? Zai tianshang de he zai dishang de, yu ri yue qunxing, shanyue shumu, shengchu he xuduo ren, dou wei an la er koutou, you xuduo ren dang shou xingfa. An la lingru shei, shei bu shou zunjing. An la jiu zheyang zuo tasuo yu yi zhi shi
Zhe liang pai shi xiang zheng de, tamen jinxing guanyu tamen de zhu de zhenglun. Bu xindao zhe yijing you wei tamen er cai zhi de huo yile, feishui jiang qingzhu zai tamen de tou shang
tamen de neizang he pifu jiang bei feishui suo ronghua
Tamen jiang xiangshou tie bian de chouda
Tamen mei yin choumen er tao chu huo yu, dou bei lan huiqu. Nimen changshi shaozhuo de xingfa ba
An la biding yao shi xindao erqie xingshan zhe jinru na xia lin zhu he de leyuan, tamen zai qizhong de xiangyong jin zhuo he zhenzhu zuo zhuangshi, tamen de yifu shi sichou de
Tamen ceng meng yindao, guchang shuo youmei de yuyan; tamen ceng meng yindao, gu zunxun shou zansong zhe de dadao

Bu xindao erqie fang'ai zhu dao, bingqie fang'ai wo shi zhongren——dingju de he youmu de——gongtong zunjing jin si zhe,(wo jiang shi ta shaoshao changshi tongku de xingfa); shei yin bu yi er yu zai jin sizhong weibei zhengdao, wo jiang shi shei shaoshao changshi tongku de xingfa
Dangshi wo ceng wei yi bo la xin zhiding tian fang di dizhi, wo shuo: Ni buyao yi renhe wu pei wo, ni yingdang wei huanxing zhe, lizheng zhe, jugong zhe he koutou zhe, dasao wo de fangwu
Ni yingdang zai zhongren zhong xuangao chaojin, tamen jiu cong yuandao huo tubu huo chengzhe shou tuo, dao ni zheli lai

yibian tamen jianzheng tamen suoyou de xuduo liyi, bingqie zai guiding de ruogan rinei, jinian an la zhi ming er tuzai ta ci gei tamen de shengchu.” Nimen keyi chi naxie shengchu de rou, bingqie yingdang yong qi kuandai kunku de he pinqiong de ren
Ranhou jiao tamen dichu tamen de wugou, jiao tamen luxing tamen de shiyuan, jiao tamen weirao na jian gu fang er huanxing

Shiqing jiushi zheyang, shei zunzhong an la de jielu, zai zhu di nali na duiyu shei jiushi geng hao de. Yiqie shengchu dui nimen dou shi hefa de, dui nimen xuanbu jin jie de chuwai. Gu, nimen yingdang bi kai wuhui ji ouxiang, yingdang yong li wangyu
tongshi wei an la er xinfeng zhengjiao, bu yi wu pei ta. Shei yi wu pei an la, shei ru cong tiankong zhuiluo, er bei qun niao duo zou, huo bei dafeng saodang dao yuanfang
Shiqing jiushi zheyang, shei zunjing an la de biaozhi, na shi xinzhong de qiancheng fachu de
Shengchu duiyu nimen, you ruogan liyi, zhiyu yige dingqi, ranhou (tuzai tamen zuo gong xian) de hefa difang yinggai shi gu fang de fujin

Wo wei mei ge minzu zhiding yi zhong gong xian de yishi, yibian tamen jinian an la zhi ming er tuzai ta suo ci tamen de shengchu. Nimen de shenming shi du yi de shenming, gu nimen yingdang zhi guishun ta. Ni yingdang yi xixun chuan shi qiangong zhe
Dang jinian an la de shihou, zhongxin gandao kongju zhe——gandao zhan su zhe——renshou kunan zhe, jin shou bai gong zhe, fen she wo suo ci zhi wu zhe

wo wei nimen yi luotuo wei an la de biaozhi, tamen duiyu nimen you xuduo yongchu; tamen pailie chengxing de shihou, nimen yingdang wei tuzai tamen er jinian an la zhi ming; dang tamen ce wo zai dishang de shihou, nimen keyi chi tamen de rou, bing yingdang kuandai zhizu de pinmin he qitao de pinmin. Wo wei nimen zheyang zhifu tamen, yibian nimen ganxie

Tamen de rou he xue, dou buneng dadao an la, dan nimen de qiancheng, neng dadao ta. Ta wei nimen zheyang zhifu tamen, yibian nimen wei an la dui nimen de yindao er zunchong ta. Ni yingdang xiang xingshan zhe baoxi
An la biding yao baohu xindao zhe, an la que shi bu xi'ai mei ge wang'enfuyi de panni zhe de
Bei jingong zhe, yi huode fankang de xuke, yinwei tamen shi shou yapo de. An la duiyu yuanzhu tamen, que shi quanneng de

Tamen bei wuli de zhu chu guxiang, zhi yin tamen chang shuo:“Women de zhu shi an la.” Yao bushi an la yi shiren huxiang dikang, name, xuduo xiudaoyuan, libaitang, youtai huitang, qingzhensi,——qizhong chang youren jinian an la zhi ming de jianzhu wu——biding bei ren pohuaile. Fan fuzhu an la de dadao zhe, an la biding fuzhu ta; an la que shi zhi qiang de, que shi wanneng de

Ruguo wo shi naxie ren zai dimian shang deshi, tamen jiang jin shou bai gong, wan na tian ke, quan shan jie e. Wanshi de jieju zhi gui an la. . Ruguo wo shi naxie ren zai dimian shang deshi, tamen jiang jin shou bai gong, wan na tian ke, quan shan jie e. Wanshi de jieju zhi gui an la

mai de yan ren; mu sa ye ceng bei fourenguo. Wo yourong bu xindao zhe, suihou wo chengzhile tamen; wo de qianze shi zenyang de ne

Bu xindao zhe duiyu ta rengran zai youyu zhi zhong, zhidao fuhuo shike huran jianglin tamen, huo pohuai ri de xingfa lailin tamen

Wei an la de daolu er qianju, ranhou bei shahai huo binggu zhe, an la bi shangci tamen jiamei de jiyang; an la que shi zui shanyu jiyang de

Shiqing jiushi zheyang de. Fan yi yuan baoyuan, ranhou bei ren nuedai zhe, an la bi yuanzhu ta. An la que shi zhi shu de, que shi zhi she de

Zhe shi yin wei an la shi zhenshi de, tamen she an la er qidao de (ouxiang) shi xuwang de; you yin wei an la shi zhigaowushang de, shi zhi da de

Tiandi wanwu dou shi ta de, an la que shi wu qiu de, que shi ke song de

Tamen she an la er chongbai an la suo wei zhengshi de, ye fei tamen suo zhidao de ouxiang; bu yi de ren jue meiyou renhe yuanzhu zhe

dang bieren dui tamen xuandu wo de mingxian de jixiang de shihou, ni kanjian bu xindao zhe de lian shang you bu yuezhi se; tamen jihu yao xiji dui tamen xuandu wo de jixiang zhe. Xindao de renmen a! Nimen yingdang jugong, yingdang koutou, yingdang chongbai nimen de zhu, yingdang li xingshan gong, yibian nimen chenggong

Wo que yi paiqian nu ha qu jiaohua ta de zongzu, ta shuo:“Wo de zongzu a! Nimen yingdang chongbai an la, chu ta zhi wai, jue wu ying shou nimen chongbai de. Nandao nimen bu jingwei ma?”

Ta de zongzu zhong buxindao zhe de toumumen shuo:“Zhege ren zhishi xiang nimen yiyang de yige fanren, ta xiang huode nimen de zunzhong. Jiaruo an la yiyu (pai shizhe), ta biding jiangxia xuduo tianshi. Women meiyou ting dao zai women de zuxian de shidai fashengguo zheyang de shi
Ta zhishi yige fengzi, gu nimen yingdang dengdai ta yige shiqi.”
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni yuanzhu wo, yinwei tamen yi fouren wole.”

Wo jiu qishi ta shuo: Ni zai wo de qinyan guanzhu xia, yi wo de qishi er zaochuan. Dang wo de mingling lailin, er hongshui fanlan yu dimian de shihou, ni ba ge zhong dongwu, ge qu yi dui, fang zai chuanshang, shi ni de jiashu ye shang chuan qu; tamen zhong yi bei panjue zhe chuwai. Ni buyao wei bu yi zhe er qidao wo, tamen biran bei yan si
Dang ni he tongchuan zhe zai chuanshang zuo ding de shihou, ni yingdang shuo:“Yiqie zansong, quan gui an la——ta ceng zhengjiu women tuo li liao bu yi de minzhong.”
Ni yingdang shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qing ni shi wo zai yige jixiang di difang denglu, ni shi zui hui anzhi zhongsheng de.”
Ci zhong que you xuduo jixiang, wo que shi kaoyan zhe
Zai tamen miewang zhihou, wo chuangzaole bie de shidai
wo cong tamen zu zhong paile yige shizhe, qu jiaohua tamen (shuo):“Nimen yingdang chongbai an la, chule ta, nimen jue wu ying shou chongbai zhe, nandao nimen bu jingwei ma?”

Ta de zongzu zhong de toumu, bu xindao erqie fouren houshi de xiang hui zhe, wo shi tamen zai jinshi deguo haohua de shenghuo. Tamen shuo:“Zhege zhishi xiang nimen yiyang de fanren: Ta chi nimen suo chi de, ta yin nimen suo yin de
Ruguo nimen shuncong xiang nimen yang de yige fanren, nimen biding shi kuisun de

Ta suoyong lai jinggao nimen de shi, tai bu jin qinglile
Women zhiyou jinshi shenghuo, women si, women sheng, women jue bu hui fuhuo
Ta zhishi yige ren, jiajie an la de mingyi er zaoyao, women jue bu xin ta!”
Ta shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni yuanzhu wo, yinwei tamen yi fouren wole.”
Zhu shuo:“Bujiu, tamen biran yao huihen.”
Xingfa gongdao di xijile tamen, er wo shi tamen bian chengle feiliao, bu yi de minzhong yi zao huimiele
Zai tamen miewang zhihou, wo you xingqi bie de ji ge shidai
Renhe shidai, dou buneng zai ziji de xianqi zhiqian miewang, ye buneng zai ziji de xianqi zhihou lunsang

Ranhou, wo luxu de paiqian wo de zhong shizhe, mei ge zu de shizhe lailin tamen shi, tamen dou fouren ta, guwo shi tamen xiangji miewang, er shi tamen de shi ji bian cheng huabing. Bu xindao de minzhong yi zao huimie
Ranhou, wo paiqian mu sa he ta di gege ha lun, ba wo de xuduo jixiang he mingzheng
chuan shi falao he ta de chenmin, dan tamen zi da, tamen shi gao'ao de

Wo yi mai er yan he ta de erzi wei yi zhong jixiang, wo shi ta lia zai you pingdi he liushui de gaoyuan huode yige yinbi zhi chusuo

Wo que yi yong xingfa chengzhi tamen, dan tamen bu shuncong tamen de zhu, tamen ye budui ta biaoshi qianxun
Zhidao wo dui tamen kaipi yanxing zhi men de shihou, tamen wei ta er huran bian cheng shiwang zhe
Zhu ceng wei nimen chuangzao ermu he xin, nimen de ganxie shi hen shao de

ta shi si wu sheng, shi shengwu si, zhouye de gengdie you ta zhuchi. Nandao nimen bu liaojie ma

Women he women de zuxian, yiqian que yi shouguo zhe zhong jinggaole. Zhege zhishi guren de shenhua.”

Tamen yao shuo:“Wei an la suoyou.” Ni shuo:“Nimen zen bu jide ne?”

Ni shuo:“Wanwu de zhuquan, zai shei de shouzhong zhangwo? Shei neng baohu zhongsheng, er ta ziji bu shou baohu ne? Ruguo nimen zhidao.”
Tamen yao shuo:“Shi an la.” Ni shuo:“Nimen zenme bei ren mihuo?”
Buran, wo yi zhenli zhaoshi tamen, er tamen que shi shuohuang de
An la meiyou shouyang renhe erzi, ye meiyou renhe shenling yu ta tongdeng; fouze mei ge shenling bi duzhan tasuo chuangzao de, tamen ye bi yousheng lie bai. Zansong an la, chao hu tamen de miaoshu

Ni shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Ruguo ni wu bi yao shi wo kanjian tamen suo bei jinggao de,(xingfa),——

Ni yingdang yidebaoyuan, wo zhidao tamen suo miaoshu de
